TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_keepout;
INSERT INTO f_pln_keepout
WITH KEEPOUT_RAW AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(OPKOR.upload_time) AS Upload_date,
        OPKOR.project_id,
        OPKOR.tower,
        OPKOR.sbu_id ,
        OPKOR.`Level`,
        OPKOR.Flat,
        Column_Name.*,
        OPKOM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPKOM.SBU_ID AS SBU_Filter,
        OPKOM.Category,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY OPKOR.project_id ORDER BY DATE(OPKOR.upload_time) DESC) AS Dense_Ranker
    FROM O_PLN_KEEPOUT_RAW OPKOR
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
                        SELECT `Final Coat Paint - Dry Area` , 'Final Coat Paint - Dry Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Final Coat Paint - Wet Area` , 'Final Coat Paint - Wet Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Facade Stamp` , 'Facade Stamp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Bathroom Stamp - MEP (L8)` , 'Bathroom Stamp - MEP (L8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)` , 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Kitchen Stamp - MEP (I8)` , 'Kitchen Stamp - MEP (I8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)` , 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Dry Area Stamp - Civil (F7)` , 'Dry Area Stamp - Civil (F7)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Dry Area Stamp - MEP (F8)` , 'Dry Area Stamp - MEP (F8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `MEP NOC` , 'MEP NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Civil NOC` , 'Civil NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `MEP Field Report 1ST Insp` , 'MEP Field Report 1ST Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `MEP Field Report 2nd Insp` , 'MEP Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Facade Field Report 1st Insp` , 'Facade Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Facade Field Report 2nd Insp` , 'Facade Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Civil Field Report 1st Insp` , 'Civil Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Civil Field Report 2nd Insp` , 'Civil Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `SCL Signoff` , 'SCL Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `PNCA Signoff` , 'PNCA Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Keep Out (QT)` , 'Keep Out (QT)'
                        ) AS Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN O_PLN_KEEPOUT_MAP OPKOM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = OPKOM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
        WHERE value IS NOT NULL),
Final_Raw AS (
    SELECT
        KOR.Upload_date,
        KOR.project_id,
        KOR.tower,
        KOR.sbu_id,
        KOR.SBU_Filter,
        KOR.`Level`,
        KOR.Flat,
        KOR.Type_of_work,
        KOR.ACTIVITY_ID,
        KOR.Category,
        REPLACE(KOR.value,'/','-') AS Real_Value,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(KOR.value) IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 0
            WHEN KOR.value IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(KOR.value) NOT IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END AS value,
        OLMA.level_map
    FROM KEEPOUT_RAW KOR
        LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA ON KOR.`Level` = OLMA.`level`
            WHERE KOR.Dense_Ranker = 1)
    SELECT 
        Upload_date,
        project_id,
        tower,
        SBU_Filter,
        `Level`,
        Flat,
        Type_of_work,
        Category,
        ACTIVITY_ID,
        STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(Real_Value,'') ,'%d-%b-%y')AS 
        Real_Value,
        value,
        level_map,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('Paint') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('Facade') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('MEP') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('PMT') THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('Consultant') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(Category) IN('Client') THEN  6
            ELSE 20
        END AS CATEGORY_SORT
    FROM Final_Raw ORDER BY 2,3,4,5,6,7,9;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_flatfinishes;
INSERT INTO f_pln_flatfinishes
WITH UNION_ALL AS (
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_DRYAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_WETAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_BALCONYAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_KITCHENAREA
                ),
    UNION_CLEAN AS (
        SELECT 
        UA.Upload_Date,
            UA.project_id,
            UA.tower,
            UA.`Level`,
            UA.Flat,
            UA.sclicer,
            CASE 
                WHEN UA.value IN ('','NA','TBC','-','#N/A') THEN '0%'
                ELSE UA.value
            END AS value,
            UA.Type_of_work,
            UA.ACTIVITY_ID,
            UA.SBU_ID,
            UA.Category,
            CONCAT(UA.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', UA.Type_of_work) AS sort_type_of_work 
        FROM 
        UNION_ALL UA),
    STAGGING AS (
        SELECT
            UA.Upload_Date,
            UA.project_id,
            UA.tower,
            UA.`Level`,
            UA.Flat,
            UA.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(UA.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100 AS value,
            UA.Type_of_work,
            UA.ACTIVITY_ID,
            UA.SBU_ID,
            UA.Category,
            OLMA.level_map,
            CONCAT(UA.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', UA.Type_of_work) AS sort_type_of_work
        FROM UNION_CLEAN UA
            LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA ON UA.`Level` = OLMA.`level`
        WHERE LENGTH(value) <= 4)
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE WHEN sclicer = 'Dry Area' THEN 1
            WHEN sclicer = 'Wet Area' THEN 2
            WHEN sclicer = 'Kitchen Area' THEN 3
           WHEN sclicer = 'Balcony Area' THEN 4
        END AS Sort_Slicer,
        CASE 
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('MEP')    THEN    1
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Blockwork')    THEN    2
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Plaster')    THEN    3
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Builders Work')    THEN    4
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Facade')    THEN    5
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Tile')    THEN    6
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Screed')    THEN    7
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Paint')    THEN    8
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Gypsum')    THEN    9
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Marble')    THEN    10
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Silicone')    THEN    11
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Joinery')    THEN    12
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('SBU1')    THEN    13
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Waterproofing')    THEN    14
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Faade')    THEN    15
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('EIFS')    THEN    16
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('SFD')    THEN    17
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Water Proofing')    THEN    18
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Appliances')    THEN    19
        END AS Category_Sort        
    FROM STAGGING
    ORDER BY value;

    END AS value,

    PS.Type_of_work    ,

    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,

    PS.SBU_ID    ,

    PS.Category    ,

    OLMA.level_map

FROM PRE_STAGGING PS

    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA

        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level`

WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_business_plan_1;
INSERT IGNORE INTO f_pln_business_plan_1 (Upload_date,project_id,`Type`,SBU,`Month`,`value`,`DENSE_RANK`,sbu_sort,month_sort,year_sort,Cummulative)
WITH DATA_FORMATTER AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(upload_time) AS Upload_date,
        project_id,
        tower,
        sbu_id,
        `Type`,
        SBU,
        Column_Name.`Month`,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(Column_Name.VALUE) IN ('',' ','-')  AND `Type` = 'Plan'  THEN '0'
            ELSE Column_Name.VALUE
        END AS Value
        FROM o_pln_business_plan_raw
        cross join lateral (
                        SELECT `Jan-22` ,  'Jan-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Feb-22` ,  'Feb-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Mar-22` ,  'Mar-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Apr-22` ,  'Apr-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `May-22` ,  'May-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Jun-22` ,  'Jun-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Jul-22` ,  'Jul-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Aug-22` ,  'Aug-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Sep-22` ,  'Sep-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Oct-22` ,  'Oct-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Nov-22` ,  'Nov-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT `Dec-22` ,  'Dec-22'
        )as Column_Name(value,`Month`)
        WHERE
    --     TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ', 'Overall','Cumulative','%') AND
--         TRIM(value) NOT IN ('',' ', '-','Jan-22','Feb-22','Mar-22','Apr-22','May-22','Jun-22','Jul-22','Aug-22','Sep-22','Oct-22','Nov-22','Dec-22')
        TRIM(value) NOT IN ('Jan-22','Feb-22','Mar-22','Apr-22','May-22','Jun-22','Jul-22','Aug-22','Sep-22','Oct-22','Nov-22','Dec-22')
        AND TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')
    ),
STAGGING AS (
        SELECT
            Upload_Date,
            project_id,
            `Type`,
            SBU,
            `Month`,
            IFNULL(REPLACE(value,',',''),0.00) AS value,    
            DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY DATE(Upload_Date) DESC) AS `DENSE_RANK`
        FROM DATA_FORMATTER opbp
        /*WHERE TRIM(value) NOT IN ('','-',' ')*/
        GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6 ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5 DESC),
    PRILIM_OUTPUT AS (
            SELECT
                Upload_Date,
                project_id,
                `Type`,
                SBU,
                CASE
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 1' THEN 1
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 2' THEN 2
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 3' THEN 3
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 4' THEN 4
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 5' THEN 5
                    ELSE 6
                END AS SBU_Custom_Sort,
                `Month`,
                value                
            FROM STAGGING WHERE `DENSE_RANK` = 1 AND TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')),
PRE_FINAL AS (
SELECT
    FPBP.Upload_Date,
    FPBP.project_id,
    FPBP.`Type`,
    FPBP.SBU,
    FPBP.SBU_Custom_Sort,
    FPBP.`Month`,
        CASE
        WHEN TRIM(FPBP.`Month`) IN ('Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)') THEN null
        ELSE replace(date_format(str_to_date(concat('01-',FPBP.`Month`),'%d-%b-%y'),'%Y-%m'),'-','')
END AS ORDER_Month,
        /*concat(
        substring(date_format(str_to_date(concat('01-',FPBP.`Month`,'01-01-1900'),'%d-%b-%y'),'%d-%m-%Y'), 7,4),
        substring(date_format(str_to_date(concat('01-',FPBP.`Month`,'01-01-1900'),'%d-%b-%y'),'%d-%m-%Y'), 4,2)
        ) A,*/
    
    FPBP.value
FROM PRILIM_OUTPUT FPBP ORDER BY 2,3,5,7),
Cummulative_Sum AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        SUM(CAST(value AS DECIMAL) ) OVER(PARTITION BY project_id,`Type`,SBU_Custom_Sort ORDER BY ORDER_Month) AS Cummulative
    FROM PRE_FINAL
        )
Select Upload_date
		,project_id
        ,`Type`
        ,SBU
        ,`Month`
        ,Case when TRIM(`value`) = '0' Then '' else TRIM(`value`) end `value`
        ,DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY DATE(Upload_Date) DESC) AS `DENSE_RANK`
        ,SBU_Custom_Sort `sbu_sort`
        ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id, SBU, `Type` ORDER BY ORDER_month ASC) AS `month_sort`
        ,DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY YEAR(DATE(ORDER_month)) DESC) AS `year_sort`
        ,Cummulative
			
From (         
SELECT     PF.*,
        CUM.Cummulative        
  
FROM PRE_FINAL PF LEFT JOIN Cummulative_Sum CUM
    on PF.project_id = CUM.project_id
    and PF.`Type` = CUM.`Type`
    and PF.SBU = CUM.SBU
    and PF.SBU_Custom_Sort = CUM.SBU_Custom_Sort
    and PF.ORDER_Month = CUM.ORDER_Month
    and PF.value = CUM.value  
) A;

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Primer' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Wall Primer WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat) WMR'

        CASE        
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Blockwork') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Builders Work') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  16
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Plaster') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Screed') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Paint') THEN  8
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Gypsum') THEN  6
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Marble') THEN  10
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Tile') THEN  9
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Joinery') THEN  12
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Signage') THEN  7
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('SFD') THEN  15
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Epoxy') THEN  11
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist Services') THEN  13
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Waterproofing')THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist System')THEN  14
            ELSE 20
        END AS CATEGORY_MAP
    FROM UNION_ALL 
        LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL ON UNION_ALL.`Level` = O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL.`level`;

    SELECT 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_procurement;
INSERT INTO f_pln_procurement
WITH MAIN_TABLE AS (
SELECT
    DATE(upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    SBU,
    Classification,
    Description,
    Category,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`    
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`PR_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `PR_Plan`
    END AS `PR_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`PR_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `PR_Actual`
    END AS `PR_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Actual`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Required at site by`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Required at site by`
    END AS `Required at site by`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Actual delivery at site`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Actual delivery at site`
    END AS `Actual delivery at site`,
    DENSE_RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY DATE(upload_time) DESC) DENSE_RANKER
FROM O_PLN_PROCUREMENT_RAW oppr),
REMOVE_NULLS AS (
    SELECT
    Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    SBU,
    Classification,
    Description,
    Category,
    CASE
     WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Plan`) IS NULL THEN `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`
     ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`,
    `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`,
     CASE
     WHEN TRIM(`PR_Plan`) IS NULL THEN PR_Actual
     ELSE `PR_Plan`
     END AS `PR_Plan`,
    PR_Actual,
    CASE
    WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Plan`) IS NULL THEN `Vendor Finalization_Actual`
    ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Plan`,
    `Vendor Finalization_Actual`,
    CASE
    WHEN TRIM(`Required at site by`) IS NULL  THEN `Actual delivery at site`
    ELSE `Required at site by`
    END AS `Required at site by`,
    `Actual delivery at site` FROM MAIN_TABLE WHERE DENSE_RANKER = 1),
REMOVE_COMMENTS AS (
SELECT 
Upload_Date,
project_id,
tower,
sbu_id,
CASE 
    WHEN SBU IS NULL OR TRIM(SBU) IN ('') THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE SBU
END AS SBU,
OSM.sbu_identifier,
Classification,
Description,
Category,
CASE WHEN `Issuance of Drawings_Plan` REGEXP ('Comp.|#VALUE!|Supply|Comp') then Upload_Date ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan` END AS `Issuance of Drawings Plan`,
CASE WHEN `Issuance of Drawings_Actual` REGEXP ('Comp.|complete|details to be finalized|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Actual` END AS `Issuance of Drawings Actual`,
CASE WHEN `PR_Plan` REGEXP ('Comp.|VALUE!|Supply|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `PR_Plan` END AS `PR Plan`,
CASE WHEN `PR_Actual` REGEXP ('Central store|Comp.|Comp|Target date 14.07.2022|NA, to be removed|complete') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `PR_Actual` END AS `PR Actual`,
CASE WHEN `Vendor Finalization_Plan` REGEXP ('Supply|Comp.|Comp|Supply|#VALUE!') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`END AS `Vendor Finalization Plan`,
CASE WHEN `Vendor Finalization_Actual` REGEXP ('Central store|Comp.|Comp|complete' ) THEN  Upload_Date ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Actual` END AS `Vendor Finalization Actual`,
CASE WHEN `Required at site by` REGEXP ('As required|Comp.|#VALUE!|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Required at site by` END AS `Required at site by`,
CASE WHEN `Actual delivery at site` REGEXP ('As required|Comp.|Comp|complete') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Actual delivery at site` END AS `Actual delivery at site`
FROM REMOVE_NULLS
LEFT JOIN O_SBU_MAPPING OSM ON REMOVE_NULLS.SBU = OSM.sbu_shorts) SELECT * FROM REMOVE_COMMENTS;
