TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_criticalissue_tracker;
INSERT INTO f_pln_criticalissue_tracker
WITH CRITICAL_CLEANING AS (
SELECT
            DATE(OPCIT.upload_time) AS `Upload Time`,
            OPCIT.`Reference Number`,
            OPCIT.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`,
            OPCIT.`Raised On`,
            CASE
                WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 1%' THEN 'SBU 1'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 2%' THEN 'SBU 2'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 3%' THEN 'SBU 3'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 4%' THEN 'SBU 4'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 5%' THEN 'SBU 5'
        ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
    END AS SBU_SCLICER,
            CASE
                WHEN OPCIT.`Pending With` IS NULL
        OR TRIM(OPCIT.`Pending With`) = '' THEN 'Not Available'
        ELSE OPCIT.`Pending With`
    END AS `Pending With`,
            OPCIT.`Issue Description`,
            OPCIT.`Current Status`,
            OPCIT.`Impact On`,
            OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`,
            OPCIT.`Status`,
            OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`,
            OPCIT.`Project`,
            PROJECTS.Project_Identifier
FROM
        O_PLN_CRITICAL_ISSUE_TRACKER OPCIT
    LEFT JOIN PROJECTS ON
        OPCIT.Project = PROJECTS.Project_Short
WHERE
        TRIM(OPCIT.`Issue Description`) NOT IN ('')),
APPLYING_RANK AS (
SELECT
        *,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CRITICAL_CLEANING.SBU_SCLICER
ORDER BY
        CRITICAL_CLEANING.`Upload Time` DESC) AS DENSER_RANK
FROM
        CRITICAL_CLEANING
ORDER BY
        2
),
STAGGING AS (
SELECT
        OPCIT.`Upload Time`,
        OPCIT.`Reference Number`,
        OPCIT.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'dec','12') 
            ELSE OPCIT.`Raised On`
        END AS `Raised On`,
        OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER,
        CASE 
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 1' THEN 1
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 2' THEN 2
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 3' THEN 3
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 4' THEN 4
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 5' THEN 5
            ELSE 6
        END AS SBU_SORT,        
        OPCIT.`Pending With`,
        OPCIT.`Issue Description`,
        OPCIT.`Current Status`,
        OPCIT.`Impact On`,
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`
        END AS `Target Closure Date`,
        OPCIT.Status,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`    
        END AS `Actual Closure Date`,
        OPCIT.Project,
        OPCIT.Project_Identifier
FROM
        APPLYING_RANK OPCIT 
WHERE
        DENSER_RANK = 1),
STAGGING2 AS ( 
    SELECT     
        ST.`Upload Time`,
        ST.`Reference Number`,
        ST.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`, 
        ST.SBU_SCLICER,
        ST.SBU_SORT,
        ST.`Pending With`,
        ST.`Issue Description`,
        ST.`Current Status`,
        ST.`Impact On`,
        ST.Status,
        ST.Project,
        ST.Project_Identifier,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Raised On` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Raised On`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Raised On`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Raised On`,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Actual Closure Date` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Actual Closure Date`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Actual Closure Date`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Actual Closure Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Target Closure Date` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Target Closure Date`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Target Closure Date`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Target Closure Date`
    FROM STAGGING ST),
FINAL_OUTPUT AS (
    SELECT 
        ST2.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(LOWER(ST2.Status)) = 'open' THEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(),DATE(ST2.`Raised On`))
            WHEN TRIM(LOWER(ST2.Status)) = 'closed' AND ST2.`Actual Closure Date` IS NOT NULL THEN  DATEDIFF(ST2.`Actual Closure Date`,ST2.`Raised On`)
        ELSE NULL 
    END AS Ageing        
    FROM STAGGING2 ST2)
    SELECT 
        FO.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=7  THEN  '(0-7)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 14 THEN '(8-14)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 21 THEN '(15-21)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 30 THEN '(22-30)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
            ELSE '>30'
        END AS Agetub,
        CASE 
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=7  THEN 1
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=14 THEN 2
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=21 THEN 3
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=30 THEN 4
            WHEN FO.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
            ELSE 5
        END AS Agetub_sort        
    FROM FINAL_OUTPUT FO ;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_staircase;
INSERT INTO f_pln_staircase
WITH CLEANING_DATA AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(OPSR.upload_time) AS Upload_Date, 
        OPSR.project_id,
        OPSR.tower,
        OPSR.`Level`,
        OPSR.`Stair Case No`,
        'Staircase Area' AS sclicer,
        Column_Name.*,
        OPSM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPSM.SBU_ID,
        OPSM.Category,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  OPSR.project_id ORDER BY  DATE(OPSR.upload_time) DESC) Project_Udate_DRANK
    from O_PLN_STAIRCASE_RAW OPSR
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT `MEP Conduit Marking` , 'MEP Conduit Marking'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Cutting and Chasing` , 'Cutting and Chasing'
            UNION ALL SELECT `MEP Conduit Fixtures` , 'MEP Conduit Fixtures'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Wall Packing` , 'Wall Packing'
            UNION ALL SELECT Plaster , 'Plaster'
            UNION ALL SELECT Grinding , 'Grinding'
            UNION ALL SELECT POP , 'POP'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Medium Coat Ceiling Spray Plaster` , 'Medium Coat Ceiling Spray Plaster'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Two Coat Fine Ceiling Spray Plaster` , 'Two Coat Fine Ceiling Spray Plaster'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Ceiling Primer` , 'Ceiling Primer'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Ceiling Texture` , 'Ceiling Texture'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Wall Primer` , 'Wall Primer'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Wall Stucco banding` , 'Wall Stucco banding'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)` , 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'
            UNION ALL SELECT `MEP Pressurization Equipment` , 'MEP Pressurization Equipment'
            UNION ALL SELECT Sanding , 'Sanding'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Wall First Coat Paint` , 'Wall First Coat Paint'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Ceiling First Coat Paint` , 'Ceiling First Coat Paint'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Handrail Floor Mounted` , 'Handrail Floor Mounted'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Handrail Wall Mounted` , 'Handrail Wall Mounted'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Epoxy Grinding` , 'Epoxy Grinding'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Epoxy Bug Fill` , 'Epoxy Bug Fill'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Epoxy Primer` , 'Epoxy Primer'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Epoxy Base Coat` , 'Epoxy Base Coat'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Epoxy Final Coat` , 'Epoxy Final Coat'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Threshold Installation` , 'Threshold Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Door - Frame Installation` , 'Door - Frame Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Door - Architrave Installation` , 'Door - Architrave Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Door - Shutter Installation` , 'Door - Shutter Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Door - Ironmongery Installation` , 'Door - Ironmongery Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Door - Silicone Works` , 'Door - Silicone Works'
            UNION ALL SELECT Signage , 'Signage'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Nosing Installation` , 'Nosing Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Handrail Painting` , 'Handrail Painting'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Preparation for Final Coat Paint` , 'Preparation for Final Coat Paint'
            UNION ALL SELECT `MEP Final Fixtures Installation` , 'MEP Final Fixtures Installation'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Final Coat Paint` , 'Final Coat Paint'
            UNION ALL SELECT `Staircase Pressurization` , 'Staircase Pressurization'
        )
        as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN O_PLN_STAIRCASE_MAP OPSM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = OPSM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE Column_Name.value IS NOT NULL AND (TRIM(OPSR.`Level`) NOT IN ('') AND OPSR.`Level` IS NOT NULL)
        ),
STAGGING AS (
    SELECT 
        CD.Upload_Date,
        CD.project_id,
        CD.tower,
        CD.`Level`,
        CD.`Stair Case No`,
        CD.sclicer,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(CD.value) IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
            ELSE CD.value
        END AS value,
        CD.Type_of_work,
        CD.ACTIVITY_ID,
        CD.SBU_ID,
        CD.Category,
        OLMA.level_map
    FROM CLEANING_DATA CD 
        LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA
            ON CD.`Level` = OLMA.`level`
    WHERE CD.Project_Udate_DRANK = 1
)
SELECT 
    CD.Upload_Date,
    CD.project_id,
    CD.tower,
    CD.`Level`,
    CD.`Stair Case No`,
    CD.sclicer,
    CAST(REPLACE(CD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL(4,0))/100 AS value,
    CD.Type_of_work,
    CD.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CD.SBU_ID,
    CD.Category,
    CD.level_map,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  8
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Builders Work') THEN  2
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Plaster') THEN  3
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Paint') THEN  9
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Handrail') THEN  4
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Marble') THEN  5
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Joinery') THEN  6
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('Signage') THEN  7
        WHEN TRIM(CD.CATEGORY) IN('PMT') THEN  1
        ELSE 10
    END AS CATEGORY_SORT
FROM STAGGING CD;

        NULLIF(`R11-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R11-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R12,
        NULLIF(`R12-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R12-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R11,'') AS R13,
        NULLIF(`R11-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R13-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R14,
        NULLIF(`R12-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R14-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R13,'') AS R15,
        NULLIF(`R13-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R15-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R14,'') AS R16,
        NULLIF(`R14-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R16-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R15,'') AS R17,
        NULLIF(`R15-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R17-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R16,'') AS R18,
        NULLIF(`R16-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R18-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R17,'') AS R19,
        NULLIF(`R17-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R19-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R18,'') AS R20,
        NULLIF(`R18-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R20-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R19,'') AS R21,
        NULLIF(`R19-Trans_Id`,'') AS `R21-Trans_Id`,
        NULLIF(R20,'') AS R22,

AB AS (
SELECT * FROM AA
WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1) SELECT * FROM  AB;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_drawing2;
INSERT INTO f_pln_drawing2
WITH Main_Filters AS (
    SELECT * FROM O_PLN_DRAWING_DETAIL_DRAW
        WHERE ((`Type` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Type`) NOT IN (''))
            OR (Category IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(Category) NOT IN (''))
            OR (`Drawing Number` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Drawing Number`) NOT IN (''))
            OR (`Drawing Title` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Drawing Title`) NOT IN ('')))),
PRILIMINARY_DATE_CORRECTOR AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE
            WHEN MF.`Scheduled Date` IS NULL AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN MF.`Scheduled Date` IS NULL AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0 IN (''))    THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) IN ('') AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) IN ('') AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '00/%' AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '00/%' AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '%-00' AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '%-00' AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            ELSE MF.`Scheduled Date`
        END AS 'Remastered'
    FROM Main_Filters MF),
UNPIVOTING_DATA AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(PDC.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
        PDC.project_id,
        PDC.sbu_id,
        PDC.`Type`,
        PDC.`Villa Type`,
        PDC.Category,
        PDC.`Drawing Number`,
        PDC.`Drawing Title`,
        CASE
            WHEN PDC.Remastered IS NULL OR TRIM(PDC.Remastered) = '' THEN NULL
            ELSE STR_TO_DATE(PDC.Remastered,'%d-%b-%y')
        END AS `Scheduled Date`,
        PDC.`PNCA commitment`,
        ColumnName.*,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id
                    ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC
                    )     Project_Update_DRANK
    FROM PRILIMINARY_DATE_CORRECTOR PDC
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
            SELECT 'R0' , R0, `R0-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R9' , R9, `R9-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R8' , R8, `R8-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R7' , R7, `R7-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R6' , R6, `R6-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R5' , R5, `R5-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R4' , R4, `R4-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R3' , R3, `R3-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R25' , R25, `R25-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R24' , R24, `R24-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R23' , R23, `R23-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R22' , R22, `R22-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R21' , R21, `R21-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R20' , R20, `R20-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R2' , R2, `R2-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R19' , R19, `R19-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R18' , R18, `R18-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R17' , R17, `R17-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R16' , R16, `R16-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R15' , R15, `R15-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R14' , R14, `R14-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R13' , R13, `R13-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R12' , R12, `R12-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R11' , R11, `R11-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R10' , R10, `R10-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R1' , R1, `R1-Trans_Id`
    ) AS ColumnName(Revesion,Revesion_Date,`Revesion ID`)
    WHERE (Revesion_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(Revesion_Date) NOT IN (''))
            OR Revesion = 'R0'
    ORDER BY `Scheduled Date`),
Cleaned_Data AS (
    SELECT
        UPD.Project_Update_DRANK,
        UPD.Upload_Date,
        UPD.project_id,
        UPD.sbu_id,
        UPD.`Type`,
        UPD.`Villa Type`,
        UPD.Category,
        UPD.`Drawing Number`,
        UPD.`Drawing Title`,
        UPD.`Scheduled Date`,
        UPD.`PNCA commitment`,
        UPD.Revesion,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.Revesion_Date) LIKE '%-00' THEN NULL
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.Revesion_Date) LIKE '00/%' THEN NULL
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.Revesion_Date) IN ('') THEN NULL
            ELSE TRIM(UPD.Revesion_Date)
        END AS Revesion_Date,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.`Revesion ID`) LIKE '%-00' THEN NULL
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.`Revesion ID`) LIKE '00/%' THEN NULL
            WHEN TRIM(UPD.`Revesion ID`) IN ('') THEN NULL
            ELSE TRIM(UPD.`Revesion ID`)
        END AS `Revesion ID`
    FROM
        UNPIVOTING_DATA UPD),
Cleaned_Data_Final AS (
    SELECT
        CD.Project_Update_DRANK,
        CD.Upload_Date,
        CD.project_id,
        CD.`Type`,
        CD.Category,
        CD.`Drawing Number`,
        CD.Revesion,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(CD.Revesion) NOT IN ('R0','R1','R2','R3') THEN '>3 Revesions'
            ELSE CD.Revesion
        END AS `Revesion Corrected`,
        STR_TO_DATE(CD.Revesion_Date,'%d-%b-%y') AS Revesion_Date
    FROM Cleaned_Data CD
    WHERE (CD.`Revesion_Date` IS NOT NULL
            OR CD.`Revesion ID` IS NOT NULL)),
Revesion_Data AS (
    SELECT
        Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        `Type`,
        Category,
        `Drawing Number`,
        Revesion,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(Revesion) NOT IN ('R0','R1','R2','R3') THEN '>3 Revesions'
            ELSE Revesion
        END AS `Revesion Corrected`,
        Revesion_Date,
        COUNT(Revesion) AS Revision_Count,
--         LAG(Revesion_Date) over(partition by `Drawing Number` order by Revesion,Revesion_Date) as Next_Date,
        DATEDIFF(Revesion_Date,LAG(Revesion_Date) over(partition by `Drawing Number` order by Revesion,Revesion_Date)) as LAG_DIFFERENCE,
        Project_Update_DRANK
    FROM Cleaned_Data_Final
    WHERE Project_Update_DRANK = 1
    GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6)
    SELECT * FROM Revesion_Data;

    /**/

    SELECT 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_drawing;
INSERT INTO f_pln_drawing
WITH Main_Filters AS (
SELECT * FROM O_PLN_DRAWING_DETAIL_DRAW
    WHERE ((`Type` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Type`) NOT IN (''))
        OR (Category IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(Category) NOT IN (''))
        OR (`Drawing Number` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Drawing Number`) NOT IN (''))
        OR (`Drawing Title` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(`Drawing Title`) NOT IN ('')))),
-- Date_Corrector_Main AS
PRILIMINARY_DATE_CORRECTOR AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE
            WHEN MF.`Scheduled Date` IS NULL AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN MF.`Scheduled Date` IS NULL AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0 IN (''))    THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) IN ('') AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) IN ('') AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '00/%' AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '00/%' AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '%-00' AND (MF.R0 IS NOT NULL AND MF.R0 NOT IN ('')) THEN MF.R0
            WHEN TRIM(MF.`Scheduled Date`) LIKE '%-00' AND (MF.R0 IS NULL OR MF.R0  IN ('')) THEN MF.R1
            ELSE MF.`Scheduled Date`
        END AS 'Remastered'
    FROM Main_Filters MF),
UNPIVOTING_DATA AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(PDC.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
        PDC.project_id,
        PDC.sbu_id,
        PDC.`Type`,
        PDC.`Villa Type`,
        PDC.Category,
        PDC.`Drawing Number`,
        PDC.`Drawing Title`,
        CASE
            WHEN PDC.Remastered IS NULL OR TRIM(PDC.Remastered) = '' THEN NULL
            ELSE STR_TO_DATE(PDC.Remastered,'%d-%b-%y')
        END AS `Scheduled Date`,
        PDC.`PNCA commitment`,
        ColumnName.*,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY  PDC.project_id
        ORDER BY  DATE(PDC.upload_time) DESC
        )D_RANK
    FROM PRILIMINARY_DATE_CORRECTOR PDC
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
            SELECT 'R0' , R0, `R0-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R9' , R9, `R9-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R8' , R8, `R8-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R7' , R7, `R7-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R6' , R6, `R6-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R5' , R5, `R5-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R4' , R4, `R4-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R3' , R3, `R3-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R25' , R25, `R25-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R24' , R24, `R24-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R23' , R23, `R23-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R22' , R22, `R22-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R21' , R21, `R21-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R20' , R20, `R20-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R2' , R2, `R2-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R19' , R19, `R19-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R18' , R18, `R18-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R17' , R17, `R17-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R16' , R16, `R16-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R15' , R15, `R15-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R14' , R14, `R14-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R13' , R13, `R13-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R12' , R12, `R12-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R11' , R11, `R11-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R10' , R10, `R10-Trans_Id`
                UNION ALL SELECT  'R1' , R1, `R1-Trans_Id`
    ) AS ColumnName(Revesion,Revesion_Date,`Revesion ID`)
    WHERE (Revesion_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(Revesion_Date) NOT IN (''))
            OR Revesion = 'R0'
    ORDER BY `Scheduled Date`),
Total_Drawings AS (
        SELECT
            UPD.project_id,
            UPD.`Type`,
        UPD.Category,
        EXTRACT(MONTH FROM UPD.`Scheduled Date`) AS Total_Drawings_Month,
        EXTRACT(YEAR FROM UPD.`Scheduled Date`) AS Total_Drawings_year,
        COUNT(UPD.`Drawing Number`) Total_Drawings
    FROM UNPIVOTING_DATA UPD
    WHERE UPD.Revesion='R0'
    GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5),
Plan_Drawings AS (
    SELECT
        UPD.project_id,
        UPD.`Type`,
        UPD.Category,
        EXTRACT(MONTH FROM UPD.`Scheduled Date`) AS Plan_Drawings_Month,
        EXTRACT(YEAR FROM UPD.`Scheduled Date`) AS Plan_Drawings_year,
        COUNT(UPD.`Drawing Number`) Plan_Drawings
    FROM UNPIVOTING_DATA UPD
    WHERE UPD.Revesion='R0'
        AND UPD.`Scheduled Date` <= Upload_Date
    GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5),
CLEANED_DATA_FOR_ACTUALS AS (
    SELECT
        UD.Upload_Date,
        UD.project_id,
        UD.`Type`,
        UD.`Villa Type`,
        UD.Category,
        UD.`Drawing Number`,
        UD.`Drawing Title`,
        UD.`Scheduled Date`,
        UD.`PNCA commitment`,
        UD.Revesion,
        CASE
            WHEN UD.Revesion_Date LIKE '00/%' THEN NULL
            WHEN UD.Revesion_Date LIKE '%-00' THEN NULL
            WHEN UD.Revesion_Date IS NULL OR TRIM(UD.Revesion_Date) = '' THEN NULL
            ELSE STR_TO_DATE(UD.Revesion_Date,'%d-%b-%y')
        END AS Revesion_Date,        
        UD.`Revesion ID`
    FROM UNPIVOTING_DATA UD
    ORDER BY Revesion_Date),
Actuals_Drawings AS (
    SELECT
        UPD.project_id,
        UPD.`Type`,
        UPD.Category,
        EXTRACT(MONTH FROM UPD.Revesion_Date) AS Actuals_Drawings_Month,
        EXTRACT(YEAR FROM UPD.Revesion_Date) AS Actuals_Drawings_year,
        COUNT(UPD.`Drawing Number`) Actuals_Drawings
    FROM CLEANED_DATA_FOR_ACTUALS UPD
    WHERE UPD.Revesion='R0'
        AND UPD.`Scheduled Date` <= Upload_Date
        AND (UPD.Revesion_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(UPD.Revesion_Date) NOT IN (''))
    GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5),
Date_Dimention AS (
    SELECT
        REPLACE(DD.`year`,',','')  AS`year`,
        DD.`month`,
        DD.quarter
    FROM Date_Dimention DD
    WHERE     DD.`year` <= YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
        AND DD.`year` >= YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())-1
        GROUP BY 1,2,3
    ),
   COMOUND_KEY_STAGGING AS (
        SELECT
            project_id,
            `Type`,
           Category,
           Upload_Date
    FROM UNPIVOTING_DATA
    where D_RANK = 1 GROUP BY 1,2,3,4),
COMPOUND_KEY AS (
    SELECT
        *
    FROM COMOUND_KEY_STAGGING
        CROSS JOIN Date_Dimention
    ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6),
OUTPUT_ AS (
    SELECT
        C.*,
        TD.Total_Drawings,
        PD.Plan_Drawings,
        AD.Actuals_Drawings,
        (IFNULL(PD.Plan_Drawings,0)-IFNULL(AD.Actuals_Drawings,0)) AS ShortFall_Drawings
    FROM
        COMPOUND_KEY C
        LEFT JOIN Total_Drawings TD
            ON C.project_id = TD.project_id
            AND C.`Type` = TD.`Type`
            AND C.Category = TD.Category
            AND C.`month` = TD.Total_Drawings_Month
            AND C.`year` = TD.Total_Drawings_year
        LEFT JOIN Plan_Drawings PD
            ON C.project_id = PD.project_id
            AND C.`Type` = PD.`Type`
            AND C.Category = PD.Category
            AND C.`month` = PD.Plan_Drawings_Month
            AND C.`year` = PD.Plan_Drawings_year
        LEFT JOIN Actuals_Drawings AD
            ON C.project_id = AD.project_id
            AND C.`Type` = AD.`Type`
            AND C.Category = AD.Category
            AND C.`month` = AD.Actuals_Drawings_Month
            AND C.`year` = AD.Actuals_Drawings_year)
    SELECT
        Upload_Date,
         project_id,
        `Type`,
        Category,
        `year`,
        quarter,
        `month`,
        CASE
            WHEN `month` = 1 THEN 'Jan'
            WHEN `month` = 2 THEN 'Feb'
            WHEN `month` = 3 THEN 'Mar'
            WHEN `month` = 4 THEN 'Apr'
            WHEN `month` = 5 THEN 'May'
            WHEN `month` = 6 THEN 'Jun'
            WHEN `month` = 7 THEN 'Jul'
            WHEN `month` = 8 THEN 'Aug'
            WHEN `month` = 9 THEN 'Sep'
            WHEN `month` = 10 THEN 'Oct'
            WHEN `month` = 11 THEN 'Nov'
            WHEN `month` = 12 THEN 'Dec'
        END AS `Month Text`,
        Total_Drawings,
        Plan_Drawings,
        Actuals_Drawings,
        ShortFall_Drawings
    FROM OUTPUT_
        WHERE
            (Total_Drawings IS NOT NULL
                OR Plan_Drawings IS NOT NULL
                OR Actuals_Drawings IS NOT NULL);

/**/

SELECT 1;

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT 
        Upload_Date,
          --sbu_id,
          P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
          SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
        Delivery_Order_No,
        Delivery_Date,
        Door_Type,
          Element,
        Vendor,
        sum(ASA) AS 'SUM_ASA',
        MIN(ASA) AS 'MIN_ASA',
       'Dates_Used' AS Used_Data,
       Convert(int,NULL ) AS 'MIN_ASA_DELIVERED'
  FROM (
SELECT 
    CAST(upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    [Sr_No],
    Building,
    NULLIF(Delivery_Order_No,'') AS Delivery_Order_No,
    NULLIF(Delivery_Date,'') AS Delivery_Date,
    Door_Type,
    Element,
    Fire_Rating,
    Orientation,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(Element) = 'Architrave' AND Quantity_Nos NOT IN ('') THEN Quantity_Nos/2
        WHEN TRIM(Element) = 'Architrave' AND Quantity_Nos IN ('') THEN Quantity_Sets
        WHEN TRIM(Element) != 'Architrave' THEN Quantity_Nos
    END AS ASA,    
    Remarks,
    Vendor,
    DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS AASD
FROM STG.O_PLN_DOOR_DELIVERY_RAW_STG  
) AA

LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          AA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          AA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE AASD = 1 AND Delivery_Order_No IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY Upload_Date,P.Sort_ID,SM.SBU_MAP_ID,Delivery_Order_No,Delivery_Date,Door_Type,Element,Vendor,PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
     
UNION ALL

SELECT
            Upload_Date,

   --         project_id,
               --sbu_id,
               P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
               SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
            Delivery_Order_No,
            Delivery_Date,
            Door_Type,
            [Element],
             Vendor,
            Qty_Delivered AS 'sum(ASA)',
            Final_Delivery AS 'MIN(ASA)',
            'Total_Used'   AS Used_Data,
               Case     when ROW_RANK = 1 Then MIN(Final_Delivery_Element)OVER(PARTITION BY project_id,Door_Type ORDER BY project_id)
                         Else NULL 
               End AS 'MIN(ASA) Fixed'
FROM (
SELECT
                Upload_Date,
                project_id,
                    sbu_id,
                Door_Type,
                [Element],
                Vendor,
                Delivery_Order_No,
                Delivery_Date,
                Qty_Delivered,
                LAG(Total_Delivery,2) OVER (PARTITION BY Sort_Data ORDER BY Total_Delivery,[Element]) Final_Delivery,

                    Case when [Element] ='Architrave' Then SUM(case when  [Element] ='Architrave' Then Qty_Delivered else 0 end )  OVER (PARTITION BY project_id,Door_Type ORDER BY [Element]) 
                         when [Element] ='Frame' Then SUM(case when  [Element] ='Frame' Then Qty_Delivered else 0 end ) OVER (PARTITION BY project_id,Door_Type ORDER BY [Element]) 
                     when [Element] ='Shutter' Then SUM(case when  [Element] ='Shutter' Then Qty_Delivered else 0 end )OVER (PARTITION BY project_id,Door_Type ORDER BY [Element]) 
                     else 0 
                     end Final_Delivery_Element,

                    ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY project_id, Door_Type ORDER BY Delivery_Date) ROW_RANK
FROM (
SELECT 
                Upload_Date,
                --Door_Type,
                    Sort_Data,
                    Element,
                Vendor,
                Delivery_Order_No,
                Delivery_Date,
                Qty_Delivered,
                    project_id,
                    sbu_id,
                Door_Type,
                MIN(Qty_Delivered) AS Total_Delivery
FROM (
SELECT
                Upload_Date,
                project_id,sbu_id,
                Door_Type,
                    CASE WHEN Door_Type= 'TD1' THEN '1'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD2' THEN '2'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD3' THEN '3'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD4' THEN '4'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD5' THEN '5'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD6' THEN '6'
                     WHEN Door_Type= 'TD7' THEN '7'
                ELSE '0' End AS Sort_Data, 
                Element,
                Vendor,
                Delivery_Order_No,
                Delivery_Date,
                SUM(Set_C + Qty_S) AS Qty_Delivered
FROM (
SELECT
                D.Upload_Date,
                D.project_id,D.sbu_id,
                D.Door_Type,
                D.Element,
                D.Vendor,
                D.Delivery_Order_No,
                D.Delivery_Date,
                SUM(CAST(D.Quantity_Sets AS INT)) AS Set_C,
                SUM(CAST(D.Quantity_Nos AS INT)) AS Qty_C,
                    CASE WHEN Element = ('Architrave') THEN SUM(CAST(D.Quantity_Nos AS INT))/2 ELSE SUM(CAST(D.Quantity_Nos AS INT)) END AS Qty_S
FROM (
SELECT 
        CAST(DD.Upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        DD.project_id,DD.sbu_id,
        DD.Door_Type,
        DD.Element,
        DD.Vendor,
        DD.Delivery_Order_No,
        DD.Delivery_Date,
        DD.Quantity_Sets,
        DD.Quantity_Nos, DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY DD.project_id ORDER BY CAST(DD.Upload_time AS DATE) desc) AS KASD
    FROM STG.O_PLN_DOOR_DELIVERY_RAW_STG DD
        WHERE Door_Type NOT IN ('','-')
) D
WHERE KASD = 1 Group by D.Upload_Date,D.project_id,D.sbu_id,D.Door_Type,D.Element, D.Vendor,D.Delivery_Order_No,D.Delivery_Date
) A
GROUP BY Upload_Date,project_id,sbu_id,Door_Type,Element,Vendor,Delivery_Order_No,Delivery_Date
)AA
GROUP BY Upload_Date,project_id,sbu_id,Door_Type,Sort_Data,Element,Vendor,Delivery_Order_No,Delivery_Date,Qty_Delivered,project_id,Door_Type
)A1
)BB
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          BB.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          BB.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
',

query: 'SELECT bp.upload_time,
       bp.project_id,
       bp.SBU,
       bp.Type,
       bp.[Achieved_Revenue_Till_2022],
       bp.[Total_Revenue_BOQ],
       bp.[Balance_Revenue_to_Execute_From_2023],
       bp.Actuals_From_Business_Plan,
       pv.Update_Date,
       pv.Project,
       pv.Latest_Actuals,
       replace(replace(bp.[Achieved_Revenue_Till_2022],',',''),'-','') + bp.Actuals_From_Business_Plan + pv.Latest_Actuals as Total_to_be_considered
FROM (
  SELECT opbp.upload_time,
         opbp.project_id,
         opbp.SBU,
         opbp.Type,
         opbp.[Achieved_Revenue_Till_2022],
         opbp.[Total_Revenue_BOQ],
         opbp.[Balance_Revenue_to_Execute_From_2023],
         CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Jan_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) 
           + CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Feb_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Mar_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Apr_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[May_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Jun_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Jul_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           
           
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Aug_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Sep_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Oct_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Nov_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) + 
           CAST(replace(replace(opbp.[Dec_23], ',', ''), '-', '') AS INT) AS Actuals_From_Business_Plan,
         MAX(opbp.upload_time) OVER (PARTITION BY opbp.project_id) AS Max_BP_date
  FROM  [STG].[O_PLN_BUSINESS_PLAN_1_RAW_STG] opbp
  WHERE opbp.SBU IN (' Overall ','Overall','Overall ',' Overall')
    AND opbp.Type NOT IN ('Forecast', 'Type','Plan',' Forecast ', ' Type ',' Plan ')
) bp
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT fpp2.Update_Date,
         fpp2.[Project_Identifier] AS Project,
         SUM(fpp2.[Actual_as_on_date]) AS Latest_Actuals
  FROM [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTION_FACT] fpp2
  WHERE MONTH(fpp2.Update_Date) = MONTH(GETDATE())
  GROUP BY fpp2.Update_Date,
           fpp2.[Project_Identifier]
) pv ON bp.project_id = pv.Project
WHERE bp.Max_BP_date = bp.upload_time',

query: '
 
 SELECT DC.Upload_Time as Upload_Time,
        DC.project_id as project_id,
        DC.[Group] as [Group],
        DC.[Activity_Description] as [Activity_Description],
        DC.[Actual_Start_Date] as [Actual_Start_Date],
        DC.[Actual_Finish_Date] as [Actual_Finish_Date],
          DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Actual_Finish_Date], DC.[Actual_Start_Date]) AS Total_days,
        DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Actual_Start_Date]) AS Days_elapsed,
       CASE 
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts','Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
               'Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Transformer payment','LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Keepout' THEN 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Transformer payment','LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN (
                                                                                    'Kitchen Appliances',
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
            ELSE 'MISSING'
        END AS Source_Templet,
        OLMP.Sort_Group as Sort_Group,
        OLMP.Sort_Activity as Sort_Activity,
        OLMP.Activity_New as Activity_New,
        P.FLAT_COUNT as FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.[Actual_Percentage] as [Actual_Percentage]
--INTO #MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE
 FROM  (
 SELECT Upload_Time,
          project_id,
          [Group],
          [Activity_Description],
          CAST(CASE WHEN ISNULL(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'') = '' THEN NULL
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.[Actual_Start_Date]
        END  AS DATE) [Actual_Start_Date], 
          CAST(CASE WHEN ISNULL(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'') = '' THEN NULL
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.[Actual_Finish_Date]
        END  AS DATE) [Actual_Finish_Date],
          [Actual_Percentage]
 FROM  ( 
 SELECT
        CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,
        OPM.project_id,
        OPM.[Group],
        OPM.[Activity_Description],
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start] IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start]) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start],'-','/')
        END AS [Actual_Start_Date],
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start] IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start]) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start],'-','/')
        END [Actual_Finish_Date],
        DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) DENSERANK,
        OPM.[Actual_Percentage]
    FROM
        STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_STG OPM 
        WHERE 
(OPM.[Group] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Group]) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.[Activity_Description] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Activity_Description]) NOT IN (''))
) FC
WHERE FC.DENSERANK = 1
 ) DC
 LEFT JOIN STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG OLMP
                ON DC.[Group] = OLMP.[Group] 
                AND DC.[Activity_Description] = OLMP.Activity
 LEFT JOIN STG.PROJECTS_STG P
                ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier
',

query: '
SELECT      DAR.project_id,
            DAR.Type_of_work,
            --DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY DAR.project_id ORDER BY DAR.tower) AS RANKER,
            SUM(DAR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
               'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
--INTO #DRYAREA_GAANT_FINAL
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.[Level_ID],
            FPD.Flat,
            --FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD
WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Plaster',
                                        'Screed',
                                        'Floor Tile',
                                        'FC Framing',
                                        'FC Boarding with Joint Taping',
                                        'Floor Tiling'
                                        )
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                ) 
                    
) DAR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work          
',

                    ) 
) WAR

query: 'SELECT 
                SGS.project_id,
                'Sliding Door' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                SDR.project_id,
                SDR.Type_of_work,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Box Installation'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Frame Installation'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Glass Installation'     THEN 0.45
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Internal Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Alignment'             THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door External Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.[Level_ID],
            FPD.Flat,
            --FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Sliding Door Box Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Frame Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Glass Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Internal Silicone',
                                        'Sliding Door Alignment',
                                        'Sliding Door External Silicone'
                                        )
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                )
) SDR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work
)SGS
GROUP BY project_id
',

query: 'SELECT 
                SGS.project_id,
                'Kitchen Cabinet' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                SDR.project_id,
                SDR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet'                 THEN 0.5
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Plywood'         THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting'         THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'         THEN 0.05
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPK.project_id,
            FPK.tower,
            FPK.[Level_ID],
            FPK.Flat,
           -- FPK.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPK.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPK.Type_of_work,
            FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT] FPK 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Plywood',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Top',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting',
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting',
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'
                                        )
            AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                )
) SDR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work
)SGS
GROUP BY project_id
',

query: 'SELECT 
                KAA.project_id,
                KAA.Type_of_work,
                (KAA.SUM_ALL*100) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                KAR.project_id,
                KAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(KAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
FROM (
SELECT 
                FPK.project_id,
                FPK.tower,
                --FPK.[Level_ID],
                FPK.Flat,
                'Keep Out' AS sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(FPK.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                FPK.Type_of_work,
                FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM [DWH].[PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT] FPK 
            WHERE
                LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)',
                                            'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)',
                                            'Keep Out (QT)'
                                            )
                AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                    )
) KAR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work,tower,ACTIVITY_ID
)KAA
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work,SUM_ALL
',

query: 'SELECT 
                BGS.project_id,
                'Blockwork' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                BWR.project_id,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork First Layer'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork'                 THEN 0.4
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'GI Lintel'                 THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Above Lintel Block Work'     THEN 0.3
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.[Level_ID],
            FPD.Flat,
            --FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN ('Blockwork First Layer','Blockwork','GI Lintel','Above Lintel Block Work')
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'OR FPD.value LIKE '5%' OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%' )
) BWR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work
)BGS
GROUP BY project_id
',

query: 'SELECT 
                BGS.project_id,
                'Balustrade Works' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                BWR.project_id,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'F channel Installation'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Top Rail Bracket Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Glass Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Top Rail'                 THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade-Internal Flashing'        THEN 0.2
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPB.project_id,
            FPB.tower,
            FPB.[Level_ID],
            FPB.Flat,
            --FPB.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPB.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPB.Type_of_work,
            FPB.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPB 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPB.Type_of_work) IN ('F channel Installation','Top Rail Bracket Installation','Balustrade Glass Installation','Balustrade Top Rail','Balustrade-Internal Flashing')
            AND (FPB.value LIKE '1%'OR FPB.value LIKE '2%'OR FPB.value LIKE '3%'OR FPB.value LIKE '4%'OR FPB.value LIKE '5%'OR FPB.value LIKE '6%'OR FPB.value LIKE '7%'OR FPB.value LIKE '8%'OR FPB.value LIKE '9%')
) BWR
GROUP BY project_id,Type_of_work
)BGS
GROUP BY project_id
',

query: 'SELECT 
            P.project_id,
            SGF.Type_of_work,
            (SGF.SUM_ALL*P.FLAT_COUNT)*100 AS SUM_ALL,
            SGF.Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
            Project_Identifier AS project_id,
               --GS_Count,
            'Grade Slab' AS  Type_of_work,
            --GS_COMPLETED ,
            CAST((GS_COMPLETED/GS_Count) AS DECIMAL(15,2)) AS SUM_ALL,
               'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT' AS Source_Table
--INTO GRADE_SLAB_FINAL
FROM (
SELECT     
            P.Project_Identifier,
            COUNT(*) AS GS_Count,GS_COMPLETED
        FROM [STG].[O_PLN_STRUCTURES_POUR_MAP_STG]  OSPM 
            LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P 
            ON OSPM.project_id  = P.Project_Identifier
          LEFT JOIN
( SELECT 
            p.Project_Identifier,
            COUNT(FPS.[Level_ID]) AS GS_COMPLETED
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT] FPS
          LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P 
            ON FPS.project_id  = P.project_id
          LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] L 
            ON FPS.[Level_ID]  = L.[Level_Map_ID]
        WHERE LOWER(L.[Level]) LIKE '%grade slab%' 
            AND value IS NOT NULL 
        GROUP BY p.Project_Identifier
)  GSCM ON P.Project_Identifier = GSCM.Project_Identifier
WHERE LOWER(OSPM.type_of_pour) LIKE 'slab%'
          GROUP BY P.Project_Identifier,GS_COMPLETED
) GSCU

UNION ALL 

SELECT 
        CV.Project_Identifier AS project_id,
          CV.Area AS Type_of_work,
        --A.Total_Completed,
        CAST((A.Total_Completed/CV.Value) AS DECIMAL(15,2)) AS SUM_ALL,
          'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT' AS Source_Table
--INTO OTHER_SLABS_FINAL
FROM (
 SELECT Project_Identifier, Area,Value
 --INTO COUNT_VALUE
 FROM (SELECT *,
          (Total_Podiums*Podium_Slab) AS PODIUM_COUNT,
        (Total_Typical_Floor*Typical_Floor_Slab) AS TYPICAL_FLOOR_COUNT
FROM [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] ) p
            CROSS APPLY ( 
                                     SELECT [PODIUM_COUNT],'Podium' 
                    UNION ALL SELECT [TYPICAL_FLOOR_COUNT],'Typical Floor' 
                                ) AS Virtual_table(Value,Area)
WHERE Value IS NOT NULL ) CV
LEFT JOIN  (
SELECT 
            P.Project_Identifier,
            OPTPM.Area ,
            COUNT(FPS.Pour) Total_Completed 
--INTO ACTUALS_OTHER_SLABS
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT]  FPS
               LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P 
            ON FPS.project_id  = P.project_id
               LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] L 
            ON FPS.[Level_ID]  = L.[Level_Map_ID]
            LEFT JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_TOWER_PODIUM_MAP_STG]  OPTPM
                ON P.Project_Identifier = OPTPM.Project 
 WHERE FPS.Pour LIKE 'slab%' AND
             LOWER(TRIM(L.[Level]))!= 'grade slab'
        GROUP BY P.Project_Identifier,OPTPM.Area
) A ON  CV.Project_Identifier = A.Project_Identifier
                        AND CV.Area = A.Area
) SGF
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P 
                ON SGF.project_id = P.Project_Identifier
',

query: '

SELECT 
        DC.Upload_Time,
        P.project_id,
        DC.[Group],
        DC.[Activity_Description],
        DC.[Baseline_Start_Date],
        DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date],
        DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]) AS Total_days,
        DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]) AS Days_elapsed,
        CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]) = 0 THEN 0
            WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) < 1
                AND (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) > 0 
                THEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]))
            WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) < 0 THEN 0
                ELSE 1
            END AS Completion_plan,
        CASE
--             For Manual Entry
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN (
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking'
                                                                                    )  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
--         For Structures
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
--         For Dry Area
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
--         For Wet Area    
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
--         For Corridor Area
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT'
--         For Balcony Area
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT'
--         For Kitchen Area
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
--         For KeepOut Area
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Keepout' THEN 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT'
--         Yet to be Decided
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN (
                                                                                    'Kitchen Appliances',
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
            ELSE 'MISSING'
        END AS Source_Templet,
        OLMP.Sort_Group,
        OLMP.Sort_Activity,
        OLMP.Activity_New,
        P.FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.[Actual_Percentage]
--INTO #MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE_Plan
FROM (
SELECT
        CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,
        OPM.project_id,
        OPM.[Group],
        OPM.[Activity_Description],
       -- REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/') AS  [Baseline_Start_Date],
          CAST(REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/') AS DATE) AS  [Baseline_Start_Date],[Baseline_Start],[Baseline_Finish],
          CAST(REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Finish],'-','/') AS DATE) AS [Baseline_Finish_Date],
        DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) DENSERANK,
        OPM.[Actual_Percentage]
    FROM
        [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_STG] OPM
        WHERE 
        (OPM.[Group] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Group]) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.[Activity_Description] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Activity_Description]) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.[Baseline_Start] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Baseline_Start]) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.[Baseline_Finish] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Baseline_Finish]) NOT IN ('')
                )
) DC
LEFT JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG] OLMP
                ON DC.[Group] = OLMP.[Group] 
     AND DC.[Activity_Description] = OLMP.Activity
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P
                ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier
WHERE DC.DENSERANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
        Upload_Time AS Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        --Description,
        [Actual_Percentage],
        'Actuals' AS Legend,
        OPMP.*
--INTO #Manual_Actuals
FROM (
SELECT 
    CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
     [Activity],
    --Description,
    CASE 
        WHEN [Actual_Percentage] IS NULL OR TRIM([Actual_Percentage]) IN ('') THEN 0
        ELSE ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE([Actual_Percentage],'%','') AS DECIMAL),0.00)/100 
    END AS [Actual_Percentage],
    DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC)  DenseRanker
FROM  [DWH].[PLN_MILESTONE_ACTUALS_TEMP_FACT] OPM
) C1
LEFT JOIN STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG OPMP ON C1.[Activity] = OPMP.[Activity]
    WHERE DenseRanker = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity+0.1 AS Sort_Activity,
    [Group],
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Actuals' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (A)') AS NEW_ACT  
FROM STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG opmm 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity,
    [Group],
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Plan' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (P)') AS NEW_ACT  
FROM STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG opmm',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    BA.TOWER,
    BA.[LEVEL],
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    BA.FLAT,
    'Balcony Area' as Sclicer,
    BA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN BA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE BA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    BA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    BA.CATEGORY,
    BA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM (
     SELECT BR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
             BR.PROJECT_ID,
             BR.TOWER,
             BR.[LEVEL],
             BR.FLAT,
             COLUMN_NAME.*,
             BM.ACTIVITY_ID,
             BM.SBU_ID,
             BM.CATEGORY,
             DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID,BM.SBU_ID ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) AS DRANK
         FROM [STG].[O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW_STG] BR
         CROSS APPLY  (
               SELECT        [MARKING_FOR_RAIN_WATER_PIPE] , 'MARKING FOR RAIN WATER PIPE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [RAIN_WATER_PIPE] , 'RAIN WATER PIPE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [RAIN_WATER_PIPE_PACKING] , 'RAIN WATER PIPE PACKING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_BLOCKWORK] , 'BALCONY BLOCKWORK'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_PLASTER] , 'BALCONY PLASTER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [F_CHANNEL_INSTALLATION] , 'F CHANNEL INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [NON_SHRINK_GROUT] , 'NON SHRINK GROUT'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [TOP_RAIL_BRACKET_INSTALLATION] , 'TOP RAIL BRACKET INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [EIFS_INSTALLATION] , 'EIFS INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_EIFS_PLASTER] , 'BALCONY EIFS PLASTER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [GRINDING_CLEARANCE] , 'GRINDING CLEARANCE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [CEILING_SKIM_COAT_AND_PRIMER] , 'CEILING SKIM COAT & PRIMER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SCREED] , 'BALCONY SCREED'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [DRAIN_FIXING] , 'DRAIN FIXING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [CEILING_BALCONY_BOX_INSTALLATION] , 'CEILING BALCONY BOX INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [LEFT_OVER_SCREED_IF_ANY] , 'LEFT OVER SCREED (IF ANY)'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [EIFS_WALL_TEXTURE] , 'EIFS WALL TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_GLASS_INSTALLATION] , 'BALUSTRADE GLASS INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_TOP_RAIL] , 'BALUSTRADE TOP RAIL'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_UNDER_TILE_WATER_PROOFING] , 'BALCONY UNDER TILE WATER PROOFING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_FLOOR_TILING] , 'BALCONY FLOOR TILING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_INTERNAL_FLASHING] , 'BALUSTRADE - INTERNAL FLASHING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SKIRTING] , 'BALCONY SKIRTING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [METAL_CEILING] , 'METAL CEILING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_CEILING_TEXTURE] , 'BALCONY CEILING TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COMPLETE_WALL_TEXTURE] , 'COMPLETE WALL TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_GROUTING] , 'BALCONY GROUTING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SILICONE] , 'BALCONY SILICONE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES] , 'BALCONY MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_FINAL_COAT_PAINT] , 'BALCONY FINAL COAT PAINT'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_DRAIN_COVER_SUPPLY] , 'BALCONY DRAIN COVER SUPPLY'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COVER_FIXING_FOR_BALCONY_DRAIN] , 'COVER FIXING FOR BALCONY DRAIN'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COVER_PLATE_BW_ACP_AND_EIFS] , 'COVER PLATE B/W ACP & EIFS'
             ) AS COLUMN_NAME (VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
               
     left JOIN  STG.O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP_STG  BM
     ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = BM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
     WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL  AND VALUE !='') BA
Left JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          BA.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         BA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          BA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          BA.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
     PF.Upload_Date,
     --PF.project_id,
     PF.tower,
     --PF.sbu_id,
     PF.[Type],
     PF.SBU,
     PF.SBU_Custom_Sort,
     PF.[Month],
     
     PF.ORDER_Month,
     PF.[value],
     SUM(convert(int ,value)) OVER(PARTITION BY PF.project_id,PF.[Type],PF.SBU_Custom_Sort ORDER BY PF.ORDER_Month ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS Cummulative 
FROM (
SELECT
                Upload_Date,
                project_id,tower,sbu_id,
                [Type],
                SBU,
                    SBU_Custom_Sort,
                    [Month],
                CASE
                WHEN TRIM([Month]) IN ('Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)') THEN null
                ELSE REPLACE(FORMAT(CAST(concat('01-',TRIM([Month])) AS DATE),'yyyy-MM'),'-','')
                 END AS ORDER_Month,
                CAST(value AS DECIMAL(25,2)) AS [value]
                    
FROM (
SELECT
        CAST(upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_date,
        project_id,
        tower,
        sbu_id,
        [Type],
        SBU,
          CASE
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 1' THEN 1
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 2' THEN 2
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 3' THEN 3
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 4' THEN 4
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 5' THEN 5
                    ELSE 6
                END AS SBU_Custom_Sort,
        Column_Name.[Month],
        CASE 
            WHEN CAST(ISNULL(TRIM(Column_Name.VALUE ),'') AS VARCHAR(100))  IN ('',' ','-')  AND [Type] = 'Plan'  THEN ISNULL(REPLACE('0',',',''),'0.00')
            ELSE ISNULL(REPLACE(CAST(Column_Name.VALUE AS VARCHAR(100)),',',''),'0.00') 
        END  AS Value
          ,DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS [DENSE_RANK]
        FROM STG.O_PLN_BUSINESS_PLAN_RAW_STG
        cross apply (
                                     SELECT Jan_22 ,  'Jan-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Feb_22 ,  'Feb-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Mar_22 ,  'Mar-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Apr_22 ,  'Apr-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT May_22 ,  'May-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Jun_22 ,  'Jun-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Jul_22 ,  'Jul-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Aug_22 ,  'Aug-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Sep_22 ,  'Sep-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Oct_22 ,  'Oct-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Nov_22 ,  'Nov-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dec_22 ,  'Dec-22'
        )as Column_Name(value,[Month])
        WHERE
         TRIM(value) NOT IN ('Jan-22','Feb-22','Mar-22','Apr-22','May-22','Jun-22','Jul-22','Aug-22','Sep-22','Oct-22','Nov-22','Dec-22') AND
         TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')
    ) PF1
     WHERE TRIM(value) NOT IN ('','-',' ')
   AND TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')
   AND  [DENSE_RANK] = 1 
       ) PF 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          PF.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          PF.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
      
     ',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    A.TOWER    ,
     A.Activity_Id,
     P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
     A.LEVEL,
     'Corridor' as Scilicer,
  
  CAST(REPLACE(CASE     WHEN TRIM(A.value) IN ('','NA') THEN '0%' else TRIM(A.value) end, '%', '') AS Decimal)/100 AS value,

    A.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    A.CATEGORY   ,

          CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('BUILDERS WORK') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  12
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('PLASTER') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('SCREED') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('TILE') THEN  9
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('MARBLE') THEN  10
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('FACADE') THEN  11
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('GYAUM') THEN  6
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('PAINT') THEN  8
            ELSE 20
        END AS CATEGORY_SORT,
    A.UPLOAD_DATE  
         
FROM
(
        SELECT CAST(O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.PROJECT_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.TOWER,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.LEVEL,
     COLUMN_NAME.* ,
        'CORRIDOR' AS SCLICER,
       
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.SBU_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.CATEGORY,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID , SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC
                            )     PROJECT_UDATE_DRANK
 FROM [STG].[O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW_STG]  O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW
CROSS APPLY (

SELECT     CORRIDOR_MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK     ,     'Corridor MEP Marking for Builders Work'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK     ,    'Corridor Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'
