UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING     ,     'Corridor Wall MEP Services Packing'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_PLASTER     ,     'Corridor Plaster'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_SCREED     ,     'Corridor Screed'
UNION ALL SELECT GRINDING_CLEARANCE_FOR_TILE     ,     'Grinding Clearance for Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT TILE_MARKING     ,    'Tile Marking'
UNION ALL SELECT BULL_MARKING     ,     'Bull Marking'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRICAL_CONDUITS     ,     'Electrical Conduits'
UNION ALL SELECT COLD_WATER_SUPPLY     ,     'Cold water supply'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_FIGHTING_PIPE_SUPPORT     ,     'Fire Fighting Pipe Support'
UNION ALL SELECT MODULAR_INSTALATION     ,    'Modular Instalation'
UNION ALL SELECT FRAMING_CLEARANCE_BY_MEP     ,     'Framing Clearance by MEP'
UNION ALL SELECT CENTER_LINE_MARKING_FOR_FACADE_INSTALLATION     ,     'Center line marking for Facade Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_BOX_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Box Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_FRAME_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Frame Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_GLASS_INSTALLATION     ,     'Corridor Curtain Wall Glass Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_FLASHING_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Flashing Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FLOOR_TILE     ,    'Corridor Floor Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_WALL_TILE     ,          'Corridor Wall Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_HOSE_REEL_CABINET_INSTALLATION     ,     'Fire Hose Reel Cabinet Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT GROUTING_FOR_FRAMING_CLEARANCE     ,     'Grouting for Framing Clearance'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FC_FRAMING     ,     'Corridor FC Framing'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_ACCESS_PANEL_MARKINGS_AND_INSPECTION     ,     'MEP Access Panel Markings & Inspection'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_WORKS_FOR_BOARDING_CLEARANCE     ,    'MEP Works for Boarding Clearance '
UNION ALL SELECT FRAMING_LEVELLING     ,     'Framing Levelling'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FC_BOARDING     ,     'Corridor FC Boarding'
UNION ALL SELECT JOINT_TAPING_AND_SANDING     ,    'Joint Taping & Sanding'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_PRIMER     ,     'Corridor Ceiling Primer'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT     ,     'Corridor Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,    'Corridor Ceiling First Coat Paint'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_GROUTING     ,     'Corridor Grouting'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_SILICONE     ,     'Corridor Silicone'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_SCREED     ,    'Left over Screed'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_AREA_FLOOR_TILE     ,    'Left Over Area Floor Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_AREA_WALL_TILE     ,    'Left Over Area Wall Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT REMAINING_GROUT_AND_SILICONE_WORKS     ,     'Remaining Grout and Silicone Works'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES     ,    'Corridor MEP Final Fixtures'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,    'Corridor Final Coat Paint'          
)AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
   JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP_STG]  O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP
    ON TRIM(COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK) = TRIM(O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE)
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL) A
   
   INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM]  LM
     ON          A.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          A.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          A.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          A.PROJECT_UDATE_DRANK = 1
',

query: 'SELECT      
    P.PROJECT_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    A.Upload_Time AS Upload_Date,
    A.Reference_Number,
    A.PR_PO_Other_Ref_No, 
    --A.SBU_SCLICER, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Pending_With,
    A.Issue_Description,
    A.Current_Status,
    A.Impact_On,
    A.Status,
    A.Project,
    --A.citprojectid, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Tower,
    --A.Project_Identifier, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Raised_On,
    A.Actual_Closure_Date,
    A.Target_Closure_Date,
    A.Ageing,
    CASE 
        WHEN A.Ageing <=7  THEN  '(0-7)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 14 THEN '(8-14)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 21 THEN '(15-21)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 30 THEN '(22-30)'
        WHEN A.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE '>30' END AS Agetub,
    CASE 
        WHEN A.Ageing <=7  THEN 1
        WHEN A.Ageing <=14 THEN 2
        WHEN A.Ageing <=21 THEN 3
        WHEN A.Ageing <=30 THEN 4
        WHEN A.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE 5     END AS Agetub_sort
FROM(
        SELECT 
                AC.*,
                CASE 
                    WHEN TRIM(LOWER(AC.Status)) = 'open' AND ISNULL(AC.Raised_On,'') <> '' THEN DATEDIFF(day,CAST(substring( AC.Raised_On,charindex('/',AC.Raised_On)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Raised_On,2)+'/'+right(AC.Raised_On,4) AS DATE ),GETDATE())
                    WHEN TRIM(LOWER(AC.Status)) = 'closed' AND ISNULL(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,'') <> '' AND ISNULL(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,'') like ('%/%') AND ISNULL(AC.Raised_On,'') <> '' 
                        THEN  DATEDIFF(day,cast(substring( AC.Raised_On,charindex('/',AC.Raised_On)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Raised_On,2)+'/'+right(AC.Raised_On,4) as date),cast(substring( AC.Actual_Closure_Date,charindex('/',AC.Actual_Closure_Date)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,2)+'/'+right(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,4) as date))
                ELSE NULL END AS Ageing        
        FROM(
            SELECT      
                CAST(upload_time as DATE)  Upload_Time,
                CI.Reference_Number,
                CI.PR_PO_Other_Ref_No,
                CASE
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 1%' THEN 'SBU 1'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 2%' THEN 'SBU 2'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 3%' THEN 'SBU 3'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 4%' THEN 'SBU 4'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 5%' THEN 'SBU 5'
                    ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS SBU_SCLICER,
                CASE
                    WHEN CI.Pending_With IS NULL OR TRIM(CI.Pending_With) = '' THEN 'Not Available'
                    ELSE CI.Pending_With
                    END AS Pending_With,
                CI.Issue_Description,
                CI.Current_Status,
                CI.Impact_On,
                CI.Status,
                CI.Project,
                CI.Project_id as CITPROJECTID,
                PS.Project_id,
                PS.Project_Identifier,
                CI.Sbu_ID,
                CI.Tower,
                --CI.Raised_On,
                --CI.Target_Closure_Date,
                --CI.Actual_Closure_Date
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Raised_On IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(CI.Raised_On) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.raised_on like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.raised_on as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.raised_on  end AS Raised_On,
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Actual_Closure_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(CI.Actual_Closure_Date) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.Actual_Closure_Date like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.Actual_Closure_Date as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.Actual_Closure_Date  end AS Actual_Closure_Date,
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Target_Closure_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM( CI.Target_Closure_Date) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.Target_Closure_Date like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.Target_Closure_Date as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.Target_Closure_Date  end AS Target_Closure_Date
            FROM
                        STG.O_PLN_CRITICAL_ISSUE_TRACKER_STG CI
            LEFT JOIN    STG.PROJECTS_STG AS PS 
                ON        CI.Project_id = PS.Project_identifier
                    --need to understand from where this project_short came.
            WHERE        TRIM(CI.Issue_Description) NOT IN ('')) AC
        )A
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P
    ON      A.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      A.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER',

      ON          DA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          DA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
    E.TOWER    ,
    E.LEVEL,
    'Electrical Room' as Sclicer,
    E.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN E.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE E.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    E.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    E.CATEGORY   ,
    E.UPLOAD_DATE  
FROM (
SELECT ER.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
ER.PROJECT_ID,
ER.TOWER,
ER.LEVEL,
COLUMN_NAME.*,
EM.ACTIVITY_ID,
EM.SBU_ID,
EM.CATEGORY,
DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
FROM STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_RAW_STG ER
 CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT BLOCKWORK_LAYOUT,'BLOCKWORK LAYOUT'
UNION ALL SELECT BLOCKWORK,'BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK,'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK,'CUTTING AND CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION,'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING,'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT PLASTER,'PLASTER'
UNION ALL SELECT SCREED,'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_AND_CEILING_PRIMER,'WALL AND CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'WALL STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT,'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_FIRST_COAT_PAINT,'WALL FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT METER_BOARD_FIXING,'METER BOARD FIXING'
UNION ALL SELECT METER_BOARD_PAINTING,'METER BOARD PAINTING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_CABLE_TRAY_AND_TRUNKING,'INSTALLATION OF CABLE TRAY AND TRUNKING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_PANELS,'INSTALLATION OF PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT CABLE_LAYING_AND_GLANDING_WORKS,'CABLE LAYING AND GLANDING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT DRESSING_AND_TERMINATION_OF_SMDB_AND_PANELS,'DRESSING AND TERMINATION OF SMDB AND PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT BUS_BAR_WITH_TAP_OFF_BOX_COMPLETION,'BUS BAR WITH TAP OFF BOX COMPLETION'
UNION ALL SELECT THRESHOLD,'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT FLOOR_TILE,'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION,'DOOR FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION,'DOOR ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION,'DOOR SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION,'DOOR IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SILICONE,'DOOR SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_GRINDING,'EPOXY ERINDING'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_BUG_FILL,'EPOXY BUG FILL'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_PRIMER,'EPOXY PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FIRST_COAT,'EPOXY FIRST COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FINAL_COAT,'EPOXY FINAL COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT SKIRTING,'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT POP_WORKS,'POP WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRICAL_ROOM_TOP_BOARDING,'ELECTRICAL ROOM TOP BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS,'FIRE SEALANT WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ANGLE_FIXING,'ANGLE FIXING'
UNION ALL SELECT SHAFT_BOARDING,'SHAFT BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT GROUTING,'EROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT SILICONE,'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT SIGNAGE,'SIGNAGE'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES,'MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRIC_METER_INSTALLATION,'ELECTRIC METER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT FINAL_COAT_PAINT,'FINAL COAT PAINT'
)AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
left JOIN STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_MAP_STG EM
ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = EM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
) E
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          E.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM]P
      ON          E.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          E.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          E.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
          P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
           PROJECT_ID as PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
          SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,

        [tower],

        [Drawing Number] AS [Drawing_Number],
        [Drawing Title] AS [Drawing_Title],
        NULLIF([Scheduled Date],'') AS 'Scheduled_Date',
        NULLIF([PNCA commitment],'') AS 'PNCA_commitment ',
        NULLIF(R0,'') AS R0,
        NULLIF([R0-Trans_Id],'') AS [R0_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R1,'') AS R1,
        NULLIF([R1-Trans_Id],'') AS [R1_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R2,'') AS R2,
        NULLIF([R2-Trans_Id],'') AS [R2_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R3,'') AS R3,
        NULLIF([R3-Trans_Id],'') AS [R3_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R4,'') AS R4,
        NULLIF([R4-Trans_Id],'') AS [R4_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R5,'') AS R5,
        NULLIF([R5-Trans_Id],'') AS [R5_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R6,'') AS R6,
        NULLIF([R6-Trans_Id],'') AS [R6_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R7,'') AS R7,
        NULLIF([R7-Trans_Id],'') AS [R7_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R8,'') AS R8,
        NULLIF([R8-Trans_Id],'') AS [R8_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R9,'') AS R9,
        NULLIF([R9-Trans_Id],'') AS [R9_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R10,'') AS R10,
        NULLIF([R10-Trans_Id],'') AS [R10_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R11,'') AS R11,
        NULLIF([R11-Trans_Id],'') AS [R11_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R12,
        NULLIF([R12-Trans_Id],'') AS [R12_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R11,'') AS R13,
        NULLIF([R13-Trans_Id],'') AS [R13_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R14,
        NULLIF([R14-Trans_Id],'') AS [R14_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R13,'') AS R15,
        NULLIF([R15-Trans_Id],'') AS [R15_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R16,'') AS R16,
        NULLIF([R16-Trans_Id],'') AS [R16_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R17,'') AS R17,
        NULLIF([R17-Trans_Id],'') AS [R17_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R18,'') AS R18,
        NULLIF([R18-Trans_Id],'') AS [R18_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R19,'') AS R19,
        NULLIF([R19-Trans_Id],'') AS [R19_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R20,'') AS R20,
        NULLIF([R20-Trans_Id],'') AS [R20_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R21,'') AS R21,
        NULLIF([R21-Trans_Id],'') AS [R21_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R22,'') AS R22,
        NULLIF([R22-Trans_Id],'') AS [R22_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R23,'') AS R23,
        NULLIF([R23-Trans_Id],'') AS [R23_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R24,'') AS R24,
        NULLIF([R24-Trans_Id],'') AS [R24_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R25,'') AS R25,
        NULLIF([R25-Trans_Id],'') AS [R25_Trans_Id]
FROM ( SELECT * , DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC) Project_Udate_DRANK
        FROM STG.O_PLN_DRAWING_DETAIL_DRAW_STG
    WHERE ([Type] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM([Type]) NOT IN ('')) 
     ) AB 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          AB.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          AB.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    F.TOWER,
    F.ACTIVITY_ID,
    F.Level,
    'Fire Lift Lobby' as Sclicer,
    CASE 
        WHEN F.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE F.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    F.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    F.CATEGORY,
    F.UPLOAD_DATE
     from (
        SELECT CAST(FR.upload_time as DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        FR.project_id,
        FR.tower,
        FR.Level,
        Column_Name.*,
        FM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        FM.SBU_ID,
        FM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id , FM.SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time as DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW_STG FR
    CROSS apply (
                        SELECT    MEP_Marking_for_Builders_Work    ,    'MEP Marking for Builders Work'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Cutting_and_Chasing_of_Blockwork    ,    'Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Services_Installation    ,    'MEP Services Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_MEP_Services_Packing    ,    'Wall MEP Services Packing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Plaster    ,    'Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Screed    ,    'Screed'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Lift_Door_Installation_and_Jamb_Installation    ,    'Lift Door Installation & Jamb Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Beside_Lift_Door_Blockwork    ,    'Beside Lift Door Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Beside_Lift_Door_Plaster    ,    'Beside Lift Door Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_High_Level_Works    ,    'MEP High Level Works'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    FC_Framing    ,    'FC Framing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Boarding_Clearance    ,    'MEP Boarding Clearance'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    FC_Boarding    ,    'FC Boarding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Joint_Taping_and_Sanding    ,    'Joint Taping and Sanding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_Primer    ,    'Ceiling Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_Stucco_1st_and_2nd_Coat    ,    'Ceiling Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_First_Coat_Paint    ,    'Ceiling First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_Primer    ,    'Wall Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_Stucco_1st_and_2nd_Coat    ,    'Wall Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_First_Coat_Paint    ,    'Wall First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Floor_Tile    ,    'Floor Tile'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Frame_Installation    ,    'Door-Frame Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Architrave_Installation    ,    'Door-Architrave Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Shutter_Installation    ,    'Door-Shutter Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Ironmongery_Installation    ,    'Door-Ironmongery Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Silicone    ,    'Door-Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Grinding    ,    'Epoxy Grinding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Bug_Fill    ,    'Epoxy Bug Fill'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Primer    ,    'Epoxy Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_First_Coat    ,    'Epoxy First Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Final_Coat    ,    'Epoxy Final Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Skirting    ,    'Skirting'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Grout    ,    'Grout'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Silicone    ,    'Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Signage    ,    'Signage'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Final_Fixtures    ,    'MEP Final Fixtures'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Final_Coat    ,    'Final Coat'
                        )as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP_STG FM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = FM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
       ) F
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          F.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          F.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          F.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          F.DRANK = 1',

query: ' SELECT  
 A.Update_Date,
P.Sort_ID as Project_ID,
P.Project_Identifier,
OLMA.Level_MAP_ID AS Level_ID,
A.Sbu_Id,
 A.Tower,
 A.Sclicer,
 A.Flat,
 A.Level,
 TRY_CAST(REPLACE(A.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100 AS value,
 A.Type_of_work,
 A.Activity_ID,
 A.Category,
               CASE 
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('MEP') THEN 1
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Blockwork') THEN 2
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Plaster') THEN 3
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Builders Work') THEN 4
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Facade') THEN 5
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Tile') THEN 6
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Screed') THEN 7
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Paint') THEN 8
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Gypsum') THEN 9
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Marble') THEN 10
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Silicone') THEN 11
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Joinery') THEN 12
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('SBU1') THEN 13
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Waterproofing') THEN 14
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Faade') THEN 15
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('EIFS') THEN 16
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('SFD') THEN 17
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Water Proofing') THEN 18
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Appliances') THEN 19
       END AS Category_Sort ,
       CONCAT(A.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', A.Type_of_work) AS Sort_Type_Of_Work 
 
from(          
          SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_WETAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT]
          ) A
LEFT JOIN   [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] OLMA
               ON A.Level_ID = OLMA.[Level_Map_ID]
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
  ON  A.PROJECT_ID=P.Sort_ID


















',

query: 'SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    GAR.TOWER    ,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    GAR.[LEVEL]    ,
    'Garbage Room' as Sclicer,
      GAR.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN GAR.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE GAR.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    GAR.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    GAR.CATEGORY   ,
     GAR.UPLOAD_DATE  
   
FROM 

(
        SELECT CAST(GR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
        GR.PROJECT_ID,
        GR.TOWER,
        GR.LEVEL,
        COLUMN_NAME.*,
        GM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        GM.SBU_ID,
        GM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ,GM.SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_RAW_STG  GR
    CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT    [OUTER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'OUTER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GARBAGE_CHUTE_WORKS]     ,  'GARBAGE CHUTE WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PIPING_WORKS]     ,  'MEP PIPING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PRESSURE_TEST_AND_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP PRESSURE TEST & CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [INNER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'INNER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK]     ,  'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'CUTTING & CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION]     ,  'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING]     ,  'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [PLASTER]     ,  'PLASTER'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CORE_CUTTING_AND_CHIPPING]     ,  'CORE CUTTING & CHIPPING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_SLEEVE_INSTALLATION]     ,  'MEP SLEEVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [BORE_PACKING]     ,  'BORE PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [UNDER_SCREED_WATER_PROOFING]     ,  'UNDER SCREED WATER PROOFING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SCREED]     ,  'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_TILE]     ,  'WALL TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_FRAMING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP FRAMING CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FALSE_CEILING_FRAMING]     ,  'FALSE CEILING FRAMING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_BOARDING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP BOARDING CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FALSE_CEILING_BOARDING]     ,  'FALSE CEILING BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_PRIMER]     ,  'CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT]     ,  'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT]     ,  'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT   [UNDER_TILE_WATER_PROOFING]     ,  'UNDER TILE WATER PROOFING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [THRESHOLD]     ,  'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FLOOR_TILE]     ,  'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SKIRTING]     ,  'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GROUTING]     ,  'GROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SILICONE]     ,  'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [HOPPER_DOOR]     ,  'HOPPER DOOR'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SILICONE]     ,  'DOOR-SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SIGNAGE]     ,  'SIGNAGE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES]     ,  'MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FINAL_COAT_PAINT]     ,  'FINAL COAT PAINT'

                        )AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
    INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_MAP_STG  GM
    ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = GM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
     ) GAR
INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          GAR.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          GAR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          GAR.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          GAR.DRANK = 1',

query: 'select
        Upload_Date,
        P.Sort_ID AS Project_ID,
        SM.SBU_Map_ID AS Sbu_ID,
        LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS Level_ID,
        KO.Tower,
        P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
        KO.Flat,
        KO.Level,
        KO.Type_of_work,
        KO.Category,
        KO.Activity_ID,
       Format(cast(NULLIF(KO.Value,'') AS DATE ),'dd-MM-yyy')AS Real_Value,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(KO.value) IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 0
            WHEN KO.value IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(KO.value) NOT IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END AS value,
        
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Paint') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Facade') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('MEP') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('PMT') THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Consultant') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Client') THEN  6
            ELSE 20
        END AS Category_Sort
    FROM (
    SELECT
        cast(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        OPKOR.project_id,
        OPKOR.tower,
        OPKOR.sbu_id ,
        OPKOR.Level,
        OPKOR.Flat,
        Column_Name.*,
        OPKOM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPKOM.SBU_ID AS SBU_Filter,
        OPKOM.Category,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY OPKOR.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS DRanker
    FROM STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_RAW_STG OPKOR
    CROSS Apply (
                        SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Dry_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Dry Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Wet_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Wet Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Stamp , 'Facade Stamp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_MEP_L8 , 'Bathroom Stamp - MEP (L8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_Civil_L9 , 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_MEP_I8 , 'Kitchen Stamp - MEP (I8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_Civil_I9 , 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_Civil_F7 , 'Dry Area Stamp - Civil (F7)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_MEP_F8 , 'Dry Area Stamp - MEP (F8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_NOC , 'MEP NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_NOC , 'Civil NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_1ST_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 1ST Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT SCL_Signoff , 'SCL Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT PNCA_Signoff , 'PNCA Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Keep_Out_QT , 'Keep Out (QT)'
                        ) AS Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_MAP_STG OPKOM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = OPKOM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
        WHERE value IS NOT NULL) KO   
INNER JOIN    DWH.PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM LM 
    ON        KO.LEVEL = LM.LEVEL 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
    ON        KO.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      KO.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
     WHERE       KO.DRANKER = 1
   

  ',

query: 'SELECT 
    Upload_Date AS Date,
    P.Sort_ID as project_id,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    tower AS Tower,
    Level,
    Flat_No,
    SM.[SBU_Map_ID] as SBU_ID,
    Apartment_Type,
    ACTIVITY_ID,
    ENGINEER_RESPONSIBLE AS Engineer_Responsible,
    Types_of_Activities AS Activity,
    delay_pln
       ,value_plan AS [Plan]
       ,Count_Pln,
    Predes_value_plan AS Predecessor_Plan,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln = 1 THEN value_plan 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_plan
    END AS Predecessor_Plan_Work_Front,
    Predecessor_Activities AS Predecessor,
    delay_act,
    value_act AS Actual,
    Count_act,
    Predes_value_act AS [Predecessor_Actual],
    CASE
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act = 1 THEN value_act
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_act
    END AS [Predecessor_Actual_Work_Front],
    CASE WHEN Planned_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Planned_SLA END AS SLA_Planned,
    CASE WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Actual_SLA END AS SLA_Actual,
    Given_SLA AS SLA,
     CASE 
            WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN     '<= 0'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 1 THEN     '= 1'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 2 THEN     '= 2'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 3 THEN     '= 3'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 4 THEN     '= 4'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 5 THEN     '= 5'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 6 THEN     '= 6'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 7 THEN     '= 7'
            WHEN Actual_SLA > 7 THEN     '> 7'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Actual_SLA_Title
FROM [DWH].[PLN_VALIDATION_DATA_OUTPUT_FINAL_B_VIEW] PP
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          PP.Project_id=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          PP.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER

',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    KA.TOWER,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    'Kitchen Area' as Sclicer,
    KA.FLAT,
    KA.[LEVEL],
     KA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN KA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE KA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    KA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    KA.CATEGORY,
     KA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM (
          SELECT 
               KR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
               KR.PROJECT_ID,
               KR.TOWER,
               KR.[LEVEL],
               KR.FLAT,
               COLUMN_NAME.*,
               KM.ACTIVITY_ID,
               KM.SBU_ID,
               KM.CATEGORY,
               DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID,KM.SBU_ID ORDER BY   Convert(Date,UPLOAD_TIME) DESC ) DRANK
           FROM [STG].[O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW_STG] KR
           CROSS APPLY (
                          SELECT [KITCHEN_AREA_PLASTER] , 'KITCHEN AREA PLASTER'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_FRAMING_CLEARANCE],'KITCHEN / UTILITY FRAMING CLEARANCE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_FRAMING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY FRAMING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_BOARDING_CLEARANCE],'KITCHEN / UTILITY BOARDING CLEARANCE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_BOARDING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY BOARDING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_WALL_TILE] , 'KITCHEN WALL TILE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_BOX_FIXING] , 'MEP BOX FIXING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET] , 'KITCHEN CABINET'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_PLYWOOD] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER PLYWOOD'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_TOP] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER TOP'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_TOP_SKIRTING] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER TOP SKIRTING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_GROUTING] , 'KITCHEN CABINET GROUTING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_SILICONE] , 'KITCHEN CABINET SILICONE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_FIXTURES_FOR_KITCHEN_CABINET] , 'MEP FIXTURES FOR KITCHEN CABINET'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_APPLIANCES] , 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES'
                         ) AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
               INNER JOIN  [STG].[O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP_STG] KM
                    ON          COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = KM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
               WHERE          VALUE IS NOT NULL
     ) KA
INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          KA.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          KA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          KA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          KA.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
     UPLOAD_DATE,
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
     --PR.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_NAME,
    TOWER,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    SBU,
    CLASSIFICATION,
    DESCRIPTION,
    CATEGORY,
    CASE     WHEN ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END          AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN
    ,CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE) AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END AS PR_PLAN
    ,CAST(PR_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS PR_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN) =0
               THEN CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE) 
      END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN
    ,CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY) =0
               THEN CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE) 
     END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY
    ,CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE) AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE
FROM(
     SELECT
               CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
               PROJECT_ID,
               TOWER,
               SBU_ID,
               SBU,
               CLASSIFICATION,
               DESCRIPTION,
               CATEGORY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)= 1 
                                   Then          FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                           when ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                                   ELSE     UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL)= 1  
                            THEN FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                    when ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                            ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                         END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when PR_PLAN= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_ACTUAL)= 1   
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when PR_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN)= 1    
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN = 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN  ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE,
               DENSE_RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY PROJECT_ID ORDER BY CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
 FROM     [STG].[O_PLN_PROCUREMENT_STG])PR
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         PR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM]
SM
     ON          PR.SBU=SM.SBU_Shorts
      where DRANK=1 ',

query: ' SELECT 

      ff. Upload_Date,
        Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        'Flatwise Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities,
           sum(case 
               when ff.value=0 then 1 else null
          End) as Yet_TO_Start,

           sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END )AS Completed,

           sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) AS In_Progress,

            AVG(ff.value) AS Average_Achived,
         SUM(ff.value) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(ff.value) AS Count_Achived,
           2 as SORT_MAIN, 
       ABS((ISNULL( unionall.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END ),0)+ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) ,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
           
           FROM(SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
            a.ACTIVITY_ID,
            a.SBU_ID,
            a.Area,
            a.CATEGORY,
            a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.Flats,
            Flat_count.Total_Floors,
            Flat_count.Scheduled_Activities
        FROM (
          SELECT *, 'Dry Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Wet Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Kitchen Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Balcony Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP_STG) a
          CROSS Apply (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Scheduled_Activities,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG]
                                                WHERE Project_Identifier !='Creek Vista Grande') AS Flat_count) Unionall

                                                Join DWH.PLN_FLATFINISHES_FACT ff 
                                                on unionall.Activity_Id=ff.Activity_ID
                                      group by   ff. Upload_Date,
       Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities
          
          --ff.Yet_To_Start_Manual,

     UNION aLL

     SELECT 
        ff. Update_Date,
      Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
       'Service Room Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities,
           sum(case 
               when ff.value=0 then 1 else null
          End) as Yet_TO_Start,

           sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END )AS Completed,

           sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) AS In_Progress,

            AVG(ff.value) AS Average_Achived,
         SUM(ff.value) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(ff.value) AS Count_Achived,
           4 as SORT_MAIN ,
         ABS((ISNULL( unionall.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END ),0)+ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) ,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
           FROM (
     SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
               a.ACTIVITY_ID,
            a.SBU_ID,
            a.Area,
            a.CATEGORY,
            a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.*
           FROM 
             (SELECT *, 'Water Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_WATERROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Electrical Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Telephone Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Fire-Lift Lobby' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Garbage Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_MAP_STG])a
CROSS JOIN (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           Total_Floors AS Scheduled_Activities, 
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG]) AS Flat_count) Unionall

                                                 Join [DWH].[PLN_SERVICEROOMS_FACT] ff 
                                                on unionall.Activity_Id=ff.Activity_ID 
                                                 group by   ff. Update_Date,
        Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities
          --Yet_To_Start_Manual
     UNION ALL

     
SELECT 
        sf.Upload_Date,
        a.Project,
       'Overall' AS Tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
       'SBU 3' AS SBU_ID,
       'Slab' AS Area,
       'Structure Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        a.CATEGORY,
          ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        COUNT(sf.Level) AS Completed,
        NULL AS In_Progress,
        NULL AS Yet_To_Start,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities,
          NULL AS Average_Achived,
        COUNT(Level) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(Level) AS Count_Achived,
           1  as SORT_MAIN ,
       ABS((ISNULL(A.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL( COUNT(sf.Level),0)+ISNULL( NULL,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
    FROM (
     SELECT 
    OPD.project_id AS Project,
    OPD.Sequence_of_Appearance AS ACTIVITY_ID,
      OPD.Sequence_of_Appearance,
    OPD.area AS CATEGORY,
    OPD.Pour_count AS ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
    Flat_count.Flats,
    Flat_count.Total_Floors,
    Flat_count.Scheduled_Activities
      FROM [STG].[O_PLN_STRUCTURES_POUR_MAP_STG] OPD 
CROSS JOIN (SELECT 
                                   0 AS Scheduled_Activities,
                                   NULL AS Flats,
                                   Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                               FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG] WHERE Project_Identifier !='Creek Vista Grande') AS Flat_count)a

                                      join [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT] sf on
                                      a. Sequence_of_Appearance = sf.Sequence_of_Appearance
                                     WHERE sf.Pour LIKE ('slab%') 
                                     GROUP BY sf.Upload_Date,
                                                
         a.Project,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
        a.CATEGORY,
          ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities
-- select 
-- COUNT(Level) AS Completed,
--Upload_Date,
--'SBU 3' AS SBU_ID,
-- NULL AS In_Progress,
-- COUNT(Level) AS SUM_Achived

-- FROM [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT]  group by Upload_Date,SBU_ID
UNION ALL
 SELECT 
        PTF.Update_Date,
        a.Project,
        PTF.tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
        a.SBU_ID,
       'Corridor' AS Area,
       'Corridor Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        a.CATEGORY,
        a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities,
       AVG(Try_CAST(PTF.value as decimal(15,4))) AS Average_Achived,
       SUM(Try_Cast(PTF.value as DECIMAL(15,4))) AS SUM_Achived,
       COUNT(Try_Cast(PTF.value As DECIMAL(15,4))) AS Count_Achived,
       SUM(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS Completed,
        Sum(Try_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS In_Progress,
       sum(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS Yet_To_Start,
        5 as SORT_MAIN ,
      ABS((ISNULL(a.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL( SUM(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))),0)+
       ISNULL(Sum(Try_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))),0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
          from
   (
        SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
            OPD.ACTIVITY_ID,
            OPD.SBU_ID,
           'Corridor' AS Area,
            'Corridor Progress' AS Progress_Type,
            OPD.CATEGORY,
            OPD.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.Flats,
            Flat_count.Total_Floors,
            Flat_count.Scheduled_Activities
   FROM STG.O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP_STG OPD
          CROSS apply (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           Total_Floors AS Scheduled_Activities,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG] WHERE Project_Identifier !='Creek Vista Grande' )AS Flat_count)a

                                                join[DWH].[PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT] PTF
                                               ON  a.Activity_Id=PTF.Activity_ID
                                               Group By PTF.Update_Date,
          a.Project,
        PTF.tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
        a.SBU_ID,
       Area,
        Progress_Type,
        a.CATEGORY,
        a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities
   
   UNION ALL


   SELECT 
        PTF.Upload_Date,
         a.Project,
        PTF.tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
        a.SBU_ID,
        'KeepOut Area' AS Area,
        'KeepOut Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        a.CATEGORY,
        a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        a.Flats,
           a.Total_Floors,
           a.Scheduled_Activities,
       AVG(Try_CAST(PTF.value as decimal(15,4))) AS Average_Achived,
       SUM(Try_Cast(PTF.value as DECIMAL(15,4))) AS SUM_Achived,
       COUNT(Try_Cast(PTF.value As DECIMAL(15,4))) AS Count_Achived,
       SUM(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS Completed,
        Sum(Try_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS In_Progress,
       sum(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))) AS Yet_To_Start,
      6 as SORT_MAIN ,
       ABS((ISNULL(a.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL( SUM(TRY_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))),0)
        +ISNULL( Sum(Try_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))),0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
            OPD.ACTIVITY_ID,
            OPD.SBU_ID,
            OPD.CATEGORY,
            OPD.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.Flats,
            Flat_count.Total_Floors,
            Flat_count.Scheduled_Activities
     FROM STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_MAP_STG OPD CROSS JOIN (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Scheduled_Activities,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG] WHERE Project_Identifier !='Creek Vista Grande') AS Flat_count)a

                                                join DWH.PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT PTF
                                                ON a.Activity_Id=PTF.Activity_Id
                                                Group By PTF.Upload_Date,
         a.Project,
        PTF.tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
        a.SBU_ID,
        a.CATEGORY,
        a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities


   
   
   ',

        LM.Level_Map_ID as Level_Id,

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork' THEN 'Blockwork ER'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy First Coat'THEN 'Epoxy First Coat TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Grinding'THEN 'Epoxy Grinding TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Primer'THEN 'Epoxy Primer TR'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Floor Tile'THEN 'Floor Tile TR'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Installation of cable tray and trunking'THEN 'Installation of cable tray and trunking TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Installation of Panels'THEN 'Installation of Panels TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Final Fixtures'THEN 'MEP Final Fixtures TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Marking for Builders Work'THEN 'MEP Marking for Builders Work TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Services Installation'THEN 'MEP Services Installation TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Plaster'THEN 'Plaster TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Screed'THEN 'Screed TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Signage'THEN 'Signage TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Skirting'THEN 'Skirting TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Threshold'THEN 'Threshold TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall First Coat Paint'THEN 'Wall First Coat Paint TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall MEP Services Packing'THEN 'Wall MEP Services Packing TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'THEN 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat) TR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork'  THEN 'Blockwork WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork Layout'  THEN 'Blockwork Layout WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Bore Packing'  THEN 'Bore Packing WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Ceiling Primer'  THEN 'Ceiling Primer WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'  THEN 'Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat) WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Core Cutting _and_ Chipping'  THEN 'Core Cutting _and_ Chipping WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Cutting _and_ Chasing of Blockwork'  THEN 'Cutting _and_ Chasing of Blockwork WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Door_Architrave Installation'  THEN 'Door_Architrave Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Door_Frame Installation'  THEN 'Door_Frame Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Door_Ironmongery Installation'  THEN 'Door_Ironmongery Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Door_Shutter Installation'  THEN 'Door_Shutter Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Door_Silicone'  THEN 'Door_Silicone WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Bug Fill'  THEN 'Epoxy Bug Fill WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Final Coat'  THEN 'Epoxy Final Coat WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy First Coat'  THEN 'Epoxy First Coat WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Grinding'  THEN 'Epoxy Grinding WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Epoxy Primer'  THEN 'Epoxy Primer WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'False Ceiling Boarding'  THEN 'False Ceiling Boarding WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'False Ceiling Framing'  THEN 'False Ceiling Framing WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Fire Sealant Works'  THEN 'Fire Sealant Works WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Floor Tile'  THEN 'Floor Tile WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Grouting'  THEN 'Grouting WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Boarding Clearance'  THEN 'MEP Boarding Clearance WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Framing Clearance'  THEN 'MEP Framing Clearance WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Marking for Builders Work'  THEN 'MEP Marking for Builders Work WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Services Installation'  THEN 'MEP Services Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Sleeve Installation'  THEN 'MEP Sleeve Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Plaster'  THEN 'Plaster WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'POP Works'  THEN 'POP Works WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Screed'  THEN 'Screed WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Skirting'  THEN 'Skirting WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Threshold'  THEN 'Threshold WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall First Coat Paint'  THEN 'Wall First Coat Paint WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall MEP Services Packing'  THEN 'Wall MEP Services Packing WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Primer'  THEN 'Wall Primer WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'  THEN 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat) WMR'
             ELSE Type_of_work END AS Type_of_work,
          CAST(REPLACE(UNION_ALL.[value],'%','') AS DECIMAL(15,4))/100 AS value,
        UNION_ALL.Activity_Id,
        UNION_ALL.Category,
          UNION_ALL.Level,
          UNION_ALL.Sclicer,
        CASE        
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Blockwork') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Builders Work') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  16
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Plaster') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Screed') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Paint') THEN  8
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Gypsum') THEN  6
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Marble') THEN  10
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Tile') THEN  9
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Joinery') THEN  12
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Signage') THEN  7
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('SFD') THEN  15
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Epoxy') THEN  11
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist Services') THEN  13
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Waterproofing')THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist System')THEN  14
            ELSE 20
        END AS Category_Map
    FROM (SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_WATERROOM_FACT]
            UNION ALL
        SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_ELECTRICROOM_FACT]
            UNION ALL
        SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_GARBAGEROOM_FACT]
            UNION ALL
        SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_FACT]
            UNION ALL
        SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_FACT])UNION_ALL
     
        LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] LM
          ON UNION_ALL.Level = LM.level

          LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         UNION_ALL.PROJECT_ID=P.Sort_ID
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          UNION_ALL.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_MAP_ID
























',

query: '    SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    S.TOWER,
    S.LEVEL,
        S.STAIR_CASE_NO,
        'Staircase Area' AS sclicer,
     S.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN S.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE S.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    S.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    S.CATEGORY,
     S.UPLOAD_DATE,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  8
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('BUILDERS WORK') THEN  2
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PLASTER') THEN  3
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PAINT') THEN  9
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('HANDRAIL') THEN  4
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('MARBLE') THEN  5
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('JOINERY') THEN  6
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('SIGNAGE') THEN  7
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PMT') THEN  1
        ELSE 10
    END AS CATEGORY_SORT
FROM
(
     SELECT
        CAST(OPSR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE, 
        OPSR.PROJECT_ID,
        OPSR.TOWER,
        OPSR.LEVEL,
        OPSR.STAIR_CASE_NO,
        COLUMN_NAME.*,
        OPSM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPSM.SBU_ID,
        OPSM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  OPSR.PROJECT_ID, OPSM.SBU_ID ORDER BY  CAST(OPSR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
  FROM STG.O_PLN_STAIRCASE_RAW_STG OPSR
    CROSS APPLY (
                SELECT     MEP_CONDUIT_MARKING     ,     'MEP CONDUIT MARKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CUTTING_AND_CHASING     ,     'CUTTING AND CHASING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_CONDUIT_FIXTURES     ,     'MEP CONDUIT FIXTURES'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_PACKING     ,     'WALL PACKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     PLASTER     ,     'PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     GRINDING     ,     'GRINDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     POP     ,     'POP'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEDIUM_COAT_CEILING_SPRAY_PLASTER     ,     'MEDIUM COAT CEILING SPRAY PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     TWO_COAT_FINE_CEILING_SPRAY_PLASTER     ,     'TWO COAT FINE CEILING SPRAY PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_PRIMER     ,     'CEILING PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_TEXTURE     ,     'CEILING TEXTURE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_PRIMER     ,     'WALL PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_STUCCO_BANDING     ,     'WALL STUCCO BANDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     [WALL_STUCCO_(1ST_AND_2ND_COAT)]     ,     'WALL STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_CLEARANCE_FOR_PRESSURIZATION_SHAFT     ,     'MEP CLEARANCE FOR PRESSURIZATION SHAFT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     SANDING     ,     'SANDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,     'WALL FIRST COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,     'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_FLOOR_MOUNTED     ,     'HANDRAIL FLOOR MOUNTED'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_WALL_MOUNTED     ,     'HANDRAIL WALL MOUNTED'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_GRINDING     ,     'EPOXY GRINDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_BUG_FILL     ,     'EPOXY BUG FILL'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_PRIMER     ,     'EPOXY PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_BASE_COAT     ,     'EPOXY BASE COAT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_FINAL_COAT     ,     'EPOXY FINAL COAT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     THRESHOLD_INSTALLATION     ,     'THRESHOLD INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - FRAME INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_SILICONE_WORKS     ,     'DOOR - SILICONE WORKS'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     SIGNAGE     ,     'SIGNAGE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     NOSING_INSTALLATION     ,     'NOSING INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_PAINTING     ,     'HANDRAIL PAINTING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     PREPARATION_FOR_FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,     'PREPARATION FOR FINAL COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES_INSTALLATION     ,     'MEP FINAL FIXTURES INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,     'FINAL COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     STAIRCASE_PRESSURIZATION     ,     'STAIRCASE PRESSURIZATION'
        )
        AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
    INNER JOIN 
     STG.O_PLN_STAIRCASE_MAP_STG OPSM
    ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = OPSM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE COLUMN_NAME.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND (TRIM(OPSR.LEVEL) NOT IN ('') AND OPSR.LEVEL IS NOT NULL)
        ) S
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          S.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          S.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          S.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          S.DRANK = 1
',

query: 'select  a.Upload_Date,  a.Project_id as Proect_Identifier, a.Area, c.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS Level_Id, a.sbu_id,
        a.LEVEL, a.Pour_count, a.POUR, a.Sequence_of_Appearance,
        a.VALUE as value,a.Sort_ID as project_id, b.Next_Date, b.AVG_DAYS as Avg_days,
        CASE 
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Tower' THEN     1
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Podium' THEN     2
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Podium-TA' THEN 3
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Tower A' THEN     4
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Podium-TB' THEN 5
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Tower B' THEN     6
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Tower C' THEN     7
            WHEN a.AREA = 'Tower D' THEN     8
        ELSE NULL
        END AS View_Map,
        CASE WHEN a.VALUE < GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS value_Average from 
(select * from STG.O_PLN_STRUCTURE_POURING_STG1) a
left join
(select a.Project_Identifier, a.AREA,a.LEVEL, a.POUR,a.VALUE,
    LAG(a.VALUE) over(partition by a.Project_Identifier,a.Pour order by a.Pour,value) as Next_Date,
    DATEDIFF(day,LAG(a.VALUE) OVER(PARTITION BY a.Project_Identifier ,a.POUR ORDER BY a.POUR,a.VALUE),a.VALUE) AS AVG_DAYS from
     (select * from STG.O_PLN_STRUCTURE_POURING_STG1 where LOWER(POUR) like 'slab%'  AND LOWER(LEVEL) NOT LIKE 'grade%') a) b
ON a.Project_Identifier = b.Project_Identifier AND a.Pour = b.Pour AND a.VALUE = b.value
left join
(select * from DWH.PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM) c ON  a.LEVEL = c.LEVEL',

query: 'select 
        GAR.Id_,
          GAR.upload_time,  
          GAR.tower, 
          p.Sort_ID as project_id,
          sm.Sbu_Map_Id as sbu_id,
          RTRIM(GAR.SBU) as SBU,
          RTRIM(GAR.Project) as Project, 
          RTRIM(GAR.type) as type,
          GAR.Sub_Contractor,
          GAR.Activity,
          GAR.SCL_Engineer,
          GAR.Shift, 
          GAR.Count,
          GAR. Trade
from(
select
          s.Id_,
          s.upload_time,  
          s.tower, 
          RTRIM(s.SBU) as SBU,
          RTRIM(s.Project) as Project, 
          RTRIM(s.type) as type,
          s.Sub_Contractor,
          s.Activity,
          s.SCL_Engineer,
          column_name.Trade_uncleaned as Trade,
          case when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%D' then 'Day'
                when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%N' then 'Night'
                when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%D/N' then 'Day_Night'
                else 'Error'
                end as Shift, 
          column_name.Count
from STG.O_PLN_SUBCONTRACTOR_MANPOWER_STG s
cross Apply (
                         SELECT     PM_And_Engineers_D     ,     'PM & Engineers_D'

                         UNION ALL SELECT     Facade_Technicians_N     ,     'Facade Technicians_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Facade_Technicians_D_N     ,     'Facade Technicians_D/N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     POP_Mason_D     ,     'POP Mason_D'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     POP_Mason_N     ,     'POP Mason_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     POP_Mason_D_N     ,     'POP Mason_D/N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Joinery_Polisher_D     ,     'Joinery Polisher_D'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Joinery_Polisher_N     ,     'Joinery Polisher_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Joinery_Polisher_D_N     ,     'Joinery Polisher_D/N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Fitter_D     ,     'Fitter_D'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Fitter_N     ,     'Fitter_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Fitter_D_N     ,     'Fitter_D/N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Deep_Cleaning_D     ,     'Deep Cleaning_D'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Deep_Cleaning_N     ,     'Deep Cleaning_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Deep_Cleaning_D_N     ,     'Deep Cleaning_D/N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Others_D     ,     'Others_D'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Others_N     ,     'Others_N'
                         UNION ALL SELECT     Others_D_N     ,     'Others_D/N'
                         )as column_name(Count,Trade_uncleaned)
                         where 
                         Count not in ('',' - ','D/N','N','D','Total','SCL Engineer','Activity','Sub Total','Others','Deep Cleaning','Fitter','Joinery Polisher','POP Mason','Facade Technicians','Sub Contractor'
                         ,'HVAC','Plumber','Electrician','Steel Fixer','Marble / Stone Mason','Screed Mason','Joinery Carpenter','Gypsum Carpenter','Tile Mason',
                         'Painter','Rigger','Welder','Masons','Steel Fixers','Carpenters','Helper','Security','Operator','Scaffolder','Steel Fitter','Mason',
                         'Carpenter','Chargehand','Foreman / Staff','Supervisor','PM_And_Engineers','Supervisor')
                         and Project not in ('')
                         ) as GAR
                    LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
                         ON  GAR.PROJECT=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
              LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
                         ON   GAR.SBU=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
                    

                    

                    ',

query: 'SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    TR.tower    ,
    'Telephone Room' as Sclicer,
    TR.[Level]    ,
     TR.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN TR.value IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE TR.value
    END AS value,
    TR.Type_of_work    ,
    TR.CATEGORY    ,
    TR.Upload_Date 
FROM (
        SELECT CAST(O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW.project_id,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW.tower,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW.[Level],
        Column_Name.*,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP.SBU_ID,
        O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id , O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP.SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC
                            )     Project_Udate_DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW_STG   O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_RAW
    CROSS APPLY  (     
                 SELECT [Blockwork_Layout]  ,        'Blockwork Layout'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Blockwork]  ,        'Blockwork'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_Marking_for_Builders_Work]  ,        'MEP Marking for Builders Work'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Cutting_&_Chasing_of_Blockwork]  ,        'Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_Services_Installation]  ,        'MEP Services Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Wall_MEP_Services_Packing]  ,        'Wall MEP Services Packing'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Plaster]  ,        'Plaster'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Screed]  ,        'Screed'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Ceiling_Stucco_(1st_and_2nd_Coat)]  ,        'Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Wall_Stucco_(1st_and_2nd_Coat)]  ,        'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Ceiling_First_Coat_Paint]  ,        'Ceiling First Coat Paint'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Wall_First_Coat_Paint]  ,        'Wall First Coat Paint'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Installation_of_cable_tray_and_trunking]  ,        'Installation of cable tray and trunking'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Installation_of_Panels]  ,        'Installation of Panels'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Cable_laying_and_glanding_works]  ,        'Cable laying and glanding works'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT [ELV_installation] , 'ELV installation'
   --UNION ALL SELECT [Dressing_and_termination_of_SMDB]  ,        'Dressing and termination of SMDB'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT [Bus_bar_with_Tap_off_Box_completion]  ,        'Bus bar with Tap off Box completion'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Fire_Sealant]  ,        'Fire Sealant'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Epoxy_Grinding]  ,        'Epoxy Grinding'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Epoxy_Bug_Fill]  ,        'Epoxy Bug Fill'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Epoxy_Primer]  ,        'Epoxy Primer'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Epoxy_First_Coat]  ,        'Epoxy First Coat'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Epoxy_Final_Coat]  ,        'Epoxy Final Coat'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Floor_Tile]  ,        'Floor Tile'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Skirting]  ,        'Skirting'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [POP]  ,        'POP'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Grout]  ,        'Grout'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Threshold]  ,        'Threshold'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Door_Frame_Installation]  ,        'Door-Frame Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Door_Architrave_Installation]  ,        'Door-Architrave Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Door_Shutter_Installation]  ,        'Door-Shutter Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Door_Ironmongery_Installation]  ,        'Door-Ironmongery Installation'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT [Signage]  ,        'Signage'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_Final_Fixtures]  ,        'MEP Final Fixtures'  
   UNION ALL SELECT [Final_Coat_Paint]       ,   'Final Coat Paint'  
                        
                              ) AS Column_Name (value,Type_of_work)
   INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP_STG  O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP 
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
     ) TR

LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          TR.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          TR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          TR.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
where Project_Udate_DRANK=1',

query: 'SELECT

    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,

    WR.Type_of_work    ,

   UNION ALL SELECT          [MEP_Boarding_Clearance]  ,        'MEP Boarding Clearance'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [False_Ceiling_Boarding]  ,        'False Ceiling Boarding'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Ceiling_Primer]  ,        'Ceiling Primer'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Ceiling_Stucco_1st_and_2nd_Coat]  ,        'Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [First_Coat_Paint]  ,        'First Coat Paint'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Threshold]  ,        'Threshold'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT          [Floor Tile]  ,        'Floor Tile'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Door_Frame_Installation]  ,        'Door-Frame Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Door_Architrave_Installation]  ,        'Door-Architrave Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Door_Shutter_Installation]  ,        'Door-Shutter Installation'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Door_Ironmongery_Installation]  ,        'Door-Ironmongery Installation'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT          [Door-Silicone]  ,        'Door-Silicone'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Epoxy_Grinding]  ,        'Epoxy Grinding'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Epoxy_Bug_Fill]  ,        'Epoxy Bug Fill'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Epoxy_Primer]  ,        'Epoxy Primer'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Epoxy_First_Coat]  ,        'Epoxy First Coat'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Epoxy_Final_Coat]  ,        'Epoxy Final Coat'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Skirting]  ,        'Skirting'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [POP_Works]  ,        'POP Works'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Grouting]  ,        'Grouting'  
   UNION ALL SELECT          [Silicone]  ,        'Silicone'  
   --UNION ALL SELECT          [Signage]  ,        'Signage'

    )
        as Column_Name (value,Type_of_work)
          
    JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_WATERROOM_MAP_STG]  O_PLN_WATERROOM_MAP
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_WATERROOM_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

     ) WR

INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          WR.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          WR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          WR.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          WR.Project_Udate_DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    WT.TOWER,
    WT.[LEVEL],
    WT.FLAT,
    'Wet Area' as Sclicer,
     WT.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN WT.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE WT.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    WT.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    WT.CATEGORY,
     WT.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM
     (SELECT
          WR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
          WR.PROJECT_ID,
          WR.TOWER,
          WR.[LEVEL],
          WR.FLAT,
          COLUMN_NAME.*,
          WM.ACTIVITY_ID,
          WM.SBU_ID,
          WM.CATEGORY,
          DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID,WM.SBU_ID ORDER BY Convert(Date,UPLOAD_TIME) DESC)   AS  DRANK
     FROM [STG].[O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW_STG] WR
     CROSS APPLY (
                                SELECT  [Plastering_Clearance_with_1_Mtr_Marking],'PLASTERING CLEARANCE WITH 1 MTR MARKING'

                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Pipe_installation_Borepacking],'MEP PIPE INSTALLATION - BOREPACKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Bore_Packing],'WET AREA BORE PACKING'
